attributes.About:
"""Friends with Benefits is a block-chain based organization for bringing together like-minded
cultural creators, artists, operators, and thinkers where FWB coin holders can network, connect,
and collaborate on projects. FWB's editorial platform publishes original writing on decentralized
technology and the culture surrounding it.""Friends with Benefits is one of the best platforms to network and meet people with similar
interests and collaborate on exciting projects with talented people. The token system ensures
that the funds are invested in activities preferred by the majority of the community members."

The application form gets reviewed on a rolling basis and once approved, the user can buy an
FWB coin to become an official member of the DAO. Only official members can earn $FWD as a
reward for participation, whereas $FWD tokens can be purchased in any amount by anyone.
Buy Token""One can join DAO as a developer from https://www.fwb.help/opportunities"

attributes.About:
"The Uniswap protocol is a peer-to-peer system designed for exchanging cryptocurrencies. It is a
growing network of DeFi Apps where developers, traders and liquidity providers participate together
in a financial marketplace that is open and accessible to all. The Uniswap Protocol is managed by a
global community of UNI token holders and delegates. We can swap, earn, vote, and more with hundreds of DeFi apps, integrations, and tools built on Uniswap Protocol.
"
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Head to https://uniswap.org ""2. Click “Use Uniswap” in the top right-hand corner. ""3. Go to “Connect wallet” in the top right-hand corner and select the wallet you have. ""4. Log into your wallet and allow it to connect to Uniswap.""5. On the screen it will give you an option to swap tokens directly using the drop-down options next to the “from” and “to” sections.""6. Select which token you’d like to swap, enter the amount and click “swap.” ""7. A preview window of the transaction will appear and you will need to confirm the transaction on your ERC-20 wallet. ""8. Wait for the transaction to be added to the Ethereum blockchain. You can check its progress by copying and pasting the transaction ID into https://etherscan.io/. The transaction ID will be available in your wallet by finding the transaction in your sent transaction history.""Buy $UNI"

Balancer Protocol allows users to trade tokens, create liquidity pools, and invest in existing pools while earning yields from trades. Balancer Protocol also operates as a decentralized exchange. Users can swap their assets or provide liquidity without relying on centralized intermediaries. It can be summed up as an automated market maker, decentralized exchange, and liquidity pool protocol built on Ethereum. Balancer is an excellent innovation in the DeFi space. It's working on making the de-centralized transitions easier which is a plus point.

"

BullsOnTheBlock (BOTB) is a digital generative art project and ecosystem that currently introduces three main series of Bulls and Bears NFTs. attributes.About:
"
Merit Circle is focused on increasing accessibility and participation in the play-to-earn gaming industry by providing educational opportunities and 'scholarships' (in-game assets on loan) to people from around the world. A decentralized autonomous organization on a mission to revolutionize gaming. The returns that the project has the potential to make will be able to translate into potentially life-changing income for some of the gamers engaging with it.""Merit Circle is a DAO that consists of many different subDAOs. Each subDAO represents operations in a specific play-to-earn game. The Merit Circle DAO aims to become a bridge between the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and the captivating and fascinating world of gaming.
"
attributes.HowToJoin:
"Anyone who wants to join Merit circle needs to participate in the Merit Circle DAO by
contributing in various ways.
This can be done by
1. Through submitting a DAO proposal. Proposals should be created on the governance forum in the governance section Here is the proposal template: https://gov.meritcircle.io/t/proposal-template/21
Once a proposal has passed, changes will be implemented by Merit Circle DAO's protocol or operations team and signed by the multi-sig.""1. All the $MC holders will be invited to participate in governance.""Buy $MC here"

attributes.About:
"
Seed Club is a DAO that builds and invests in communities with tokens. Seed Club brings community leaders, brands, investors, and builders together to solve these complex problems and bring the best community tokens to market. Seed Club provides mentorship, thought leadership, and programming to help communities bring the future value of their collaboration, creativity, and connection into the present and turn their social capital into digital assets. They are devoted to helping creators and communities navigate the weird and wild world of tokens, crypto, and web3."
attributes.HowToJoin:

in web3."" https://accelerator.seedclub.xyz/
To become a member of the Seed Club DAO, you have to join their discord server and then
complete an Airtable form to indicate how you'd like to be involved. Holders of at least 10 $CLUB gain access to discord, events, educational content, contribution opportunities, and governance.""Buy $CLUB here""To join the DAO as a contributor click here"

attributes.About:
"
PartyBid lets people pool their capital together to purchase NFTs as a team. Anyone can create or join a Party to collectively bid in an NFT auction or purchase an NFT that’s on sale at a fixed price. Though it's a simple primitive, this feature can be used in a variety of ways. Anyone can start a party and direct a percentage of the fractional tokens to the address of a DAO treasury. It gives the privilege to all to join or create their own party"
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Anyone can start or join a PartyBid, donate ETH, and participate in communal bidding. ""The members can either create a party or join party to purchase the NFTs by pooling the fund.""To join party: https://www.partybid.app/all""1. Backers will immediately be able to join the PartyDAO Discord. ""2. Token holders will coordinate in Discord to decide on a plan for governance, development roadmap, and how to allocate the raised funds. "

attributes.About:
"
MakerDAO is a decentralized organization dedicated to bringing stability to the cryptocurrency economy. Dai is the collateral-backed stablecoin that offers stability. The Maker Foundation and the MakerDAO community believe that a decentralized stablecoin is required to have any business or individual realize the advantages of digital money. This protocol allows anyone with ETH or any other crypto assets to lend themselves money in the form of a stablecoin i.e DAI thereby opening the door to more risk-averse participants. And more importantly, it offers stability in the volatile world of cryptocurrency"" There is MKR, a governance token that is used by stakeholders to maintain the system and manage Dai. MKR token holders are the decision-makers of the Maker Protocol, supported by the larger public community and various other external parties."
attributes.HowToJoin: "The MakerDAO community can be joined by the following link : https://makerdao.com/en/community/""Buy $MKR from here and participate in governance."

"Rune Christensen
Rune Christensen is Chief Executive Officer and Cofounder of MakerDAO. ""https://twitter.com/runekek"

attributes.About:
"
DxDAO stands for Decentralised everything.  DxDAO is a decentralized organization that develops, governs, and grows DeFi protocols and products, owned and operated by the community. DXdao develops DeFi protocols and products focusing on prediction markets and their financial and governance utilizations. The dxDAO aims to become a community-governed DAO with total control over the DutchX trading protocol. Its treasury Is on-chain and all contributors are paid through on-chain proposals. "
attributes.HowToJoin:
"New members can join the community by joining the discord group. Become a contributor and
share what you are building.
Decide on how you would like to contribute and draft a proposal and submit that proposal.
Prepare to submit a formal proposal by buying the token. There will be a 30-day initialization process, called the Vote Staking Period, during which participants can earn Reputation (voting power) in the DxDAO ""Upload your proposals here""Buy $DXD from here"
attributes.title: DXDAO

attributes.About:
"
BitDAO aims to support builders of the decentralized tokenized economy and open economy. It is an open platform for proposals that are voted upon by BIT token holders and is agnostic to chains and projects. BitDAO is governed by $BIT token holders. One of the initiative's primary aims is to attract developer talent via token swaps and co-development efforts. BitDAO is a DAO with billions in existing assets and billions in forecasted contributions. The token swaps will enable the BitDAO treasury to accumulate a collection of the top crypto project tokens. It is permissionless to submit soft proposals on the BitDAO forum. "
attributes.HowToJoin:
"They are inviting the community to collaborate: be a community member, contributor, partner, and token holder. 
Community Members: Non-token holders can participate in our forum and social media, and share ideas. Good ideas may be adopted by BIT token holders. Community leaders may be provided with delegated votes.
Contributors: Individuals or teams that can help develop BitDAO protocols, or work to arrange due diligence and token swaps with other projects, and request grants from BitDAO.
Partners: DeFi or CeFi project that can contribute to BitDAO, or are willing to look for ways for protocols to work together.
Token Holders: BIT token holders can propose and vote on the direction of BitDAO and the use of BitDAO treasury assets.""Buy $BIT form here ""Proposal and VotingHow do I propose and vote?
Please go here: https://snapshot.org/#/bitdao.eth ""I hold BIT tokens, why can't I vote?
BIT tokens holders must delegate first before voting. You can delegate votes to your own address. "
attributes.FoundingTeam: "BitDAO was founded in June 2021 by Bybit, a China-born derivatives exchange now headquartered in Singapore. On its launch, it raised $230 million in a round led by Peter Thiel, the Thiel-founded Founders Fund, Pantera Capital, and Dragonfly Capital"

attributes.About: """Mango Markets is a decentralized exchange on the high-speed Solana blockchain. Mango Markets provide a single venue to lend, borrow, swap, and leverage-trade crypto assets through a robust risk engine. It utilizes Serum DEX for spot margin trading while continuously occurring futures are traded on Mango Markets' own order book.""The Mango Markets team is committed to providing a fully decentralized, open-source, leveraged trading platform capable of matching a centralized exchange feel with all the unique benefits of DeFi. "
attributes.HowToJoin:
"MNGO is first and foremost a governance token for the Mango DAO. This means that MNGO holders are able to participate in decision-making proposals that impact the protocol.
One needs a Solana-compatible wallet. Mango Markets offers compatibility with 2 different wallets namely Phantom and Sollet.io.
Phantom wallet: https://phantom.app/download
If you are a brand-new Solana user, select “create new wallet” If you are an existing Solana user and have another wallet, simply import it and continue. For existing users find your secret recovery phase and import your hidden recovery phase.
Sollet.io Wallet: https://www.sollet.io/
The first step in creating a new wallet is recording your seed phrase in a safe place. This phrase is the only way to recover and restore your wallet’s funds in case you forget your password, the computer breaks, or sometimes even when you clear browser cookies. This phrase is very important, so keep it somewhere safe. Add funds to the wallets and start trading.""How to Vote in Governance""1. Deposit MNGO to on DAO governance site""2. View and vote on proposals0""3. Withdraw at anytime"

attributes.About: "Gnosis builds new market mechanisms for decentralized finance. Their three product lines allows one to securely create, trade, and hold digital assets on Ethereum. GnosisDAO is a collective that uses Gnosis products to guide decisions on development, support, and governance of its token ecosystem. The DAO also runs Gnosis Auction for batch auction sells of community tokens. Gnosis is a decentralized finance (DeFi) startup that spun out from ConsenSys."
attributes.HowToJoin: "The GnosisDAO governance process is primarily conducted using the GnosisDAO category on the Gnosis Forum. Anyone can participate by clicking ‘Sign Up’ in the upper right corner at https://forum.gnosis.io/. For a Gnosis Improvement Proposal (GIP) to be accepted, it must successfully pass through three phases.""In the GnosisDAO governance process, the final phase opens proposals to a signaling method using GNO Tokens. To signal in a GnosisDAO Snapshot poll, you must hold a minimum of 1 GNO. Get $GNO on Coinbase."

attributes.About: "Radicle is a decentralized code collaboration network built on open protocols that allow for a fully open-source code stack in a  permissionless, creator-owned, interactive environment, with designated development tools. Radicle values include user freedom, accessibility, censorship resistance, user-friendliness, and security. In contrast to centralized code collaboration platforms, Radicle is designed for bazaar-style collaboration. The Radicle network is built on public key cryptography. All data related to identity and project data — not just commit, but also issues, comments, and patches — is cryptographically signed and verified using an Ed25519 keypair"

attributes.About:
" 
UXD is a decentralized algorithmic stablecoin, backed 100% by delta neutral position which solves the stablecoin trilemma. ""1. UXD Protocol is decentralized. UXD Protocol does not custody user assets, and users will not interact with any centralized entity.""2. UXD Protocol is price stable. Since UXD is 100% backed by a delta neutral position, users will always be able to redeem 1 UXD for 1 USD worth of assets.""3. UXD Protocol is capital efficient. Users can issue 1 UXD with 1 USD worth of assets, without a requirement of over-collateralization."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Although the UXD team will control initial design choices for the protocol, eventually UXP holders (UXD's governance token) will have DAO authority over future design proposals. Join the discord server to participate in discussions. Buy $UXP on Raydium."

attributes.About: "OHM, governed by the Olympus DAO, is a "non pegged stablecoin" that attempts to be less volatile than traditional cryptocurrencies while not being pegged to any fiat currencies. Instead, the value of its OHM token is meant to float based on the value of its underlying treasury of assets and parameters set by the DAO. It achieves this through minting OHM when it is greater than its intrinsic value and burning OHM when it is less. ""Olympus' long term goal is to become a currency that is stable enough to be used in daily transactions with the reasonable expectation that prices will remain the same over time while not relying on a traditional peg. Olympus DAO’s mission is to create a community-owned decentralized financial infrastructure."
attributes.HowToJoin: "There are two main strategies for market participants-""- Staking [https://docs.olympusdao.finance/main/basics/staking] ""- Bonding [https://docs.olympusdao.finance/main/basics/bonding]""Stakers stake their OHM tokens in return for more OHM tokens, while bonders provide LP or DAI tokens in exchange for discounted OHM tokens after a fixed vesting period.""Governance participants can get involved the forum and through discussions on the community discord and DAO discord servers respectively."

attributes.About: "Ribbon is a De-Fi protocol built to permissionlessly trade and yield on combinations of derivative tools packaged so as to to generate sustainable, risk-adjusted yield. Ribbon aims to be the one-stop solution for users who want to improve a portfolio's risk-return profile. Users just deposit their assets, and let the smart contracts do the rest. It is a suite of DeFi protocols that help users access crypto structured products."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"Ribbon Finance is governed by the Ribbon DAO. Ribbon DAO has two tokens:""1. RBN 
2. veRBN (vote-escrowed RBN) ""Participating in Ribbon DAO governance requires that an account have a balance of vote-escrowed RBN (veRBN) or regular RBN. veRBN cannot be transferred. The only way to obtain veRBN is by locking RBN. The maximum lock time is two years. One RBN locked for two years provides an initial balance of one veRBN. Anyone can propose a change to the system by starting a discussion in the forum or Discord, however it requires a minimum of 62,500 RBN to create a Snapshot vote. "

attributes.About:
" 
SuperRare is a marketplace to collect and trade unique, single-edition digital artworks created by artists in the SuperRare network. This NFT art platform is governed by artists, collectors and curators. It serves selected artists and interested audience with exhibitions, art projects, special releases and royalty features, via different spaces such as a crypto museum, a residency program and galleries. SuperRare sales accept ETH only. ""The SuperRare DAO is comprised of $RARE Keepers who have a shared interest in shaping the future of art. Their mission is to revolutionize the economics of human creativity by building a new art market anyone can access. Platform governance is in the hands of RARE token holders. Among other things, it incentivizes RARE holders to vote between the artists who apply to create on the platform. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "You can be a part of the SuperRare DAO in four ways:""1. Hold the $RARE token- $RARE can be purchased on popular centralized exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Gemini and decentralized exchanges such as Uniswap. ""2. Curate SuperRare via Spaces- Become a Space Operator and curate the future of cryptoart.""3. Create cryptoart for SuperRare or a SuperRare Space- Get listed as a SuperRare artist through a DAO approved curator.""4. Collect cryptoart on SuperRare.""Access the SuperRare forum here."

attributes.About: "Rook is a protocol that uses algorithmic strategists called Keepers to maximize the value of every transaction for protocols, market makers, and traders. These algorithmic strategists are bots that observe Ethereum, and other blockchains, to facilitate all sorts of transactions, such as liquidations, auctions etc.""RookDAO is a DAO focused on the work that Keepers do. It researches and builds technology that lets Keepers, users, and protocols coordinate to create a more efficient and egalitarian market for risk, and liquidity across blockchain networks like Ethereum."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Join the discord server or the forum to participate in the discussions. If you want to help Rook DAO more than just participate in the discord, make an introductory post in the discord channel #introduce-yourself and they will offer you a role depending on the needs of Rook and your abilities.""ROOK holders determine the direction of the DAO and its activities, through Rook DAO governance.""A KIP (KeeperDAO improvement proposal) is a proposal that an author or group of authors would like to be evaluated by the members of KeeperDAO. Anyone can submit a KIP. There is a standard format to follow to make KIPs easy to read and review. https://forum.rook.fi/t/kip-0-keeperdao-governance/41""If you are planning on submitting a KIP, it is recommended to attend at least one Workshop with other community members to gather feedback.""Sophons are expert members of the DAO who review pending KIPs and publish recommendations. Sophons are initially elected and can be removed by KIP proposal."

attributes.About:
"Solend is an algorithmic, decentralized protocol for lending and borrowing on Solana blockchain.
Lending and borrowing has proven itself as key in a DeFi ecosystem. However, current products are slow and expensive. On Solana, Solend can scale to being 100x faster and 100x cheaper. Solend aims to be the easiest to use and most secure solution on Solana. It offers loans, liquidity interest, and leveraging long and short positions. Solend DAO governs Solend Protocol."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Currently, Solend DAO is still in development. Proposals are usually shared in #announcements channel on Discord server. You can take part in governance discussion by verifying in #grape-faq to access private channels.""Buy $SLND from Jupiter to participate in governance."

attributes.About: "Nouns is a generative NFT project on the Ethereum blockchain which aims to improve the formation of on-chain avatar communities. Nouns are 32x32 pixel characters based on people, places, and things. One noun is generated every day and auctioned every 24 hours. The holders of these Nouns govern Nouns DAO.  "
attributes.HowToJoin: "Each Noun is an irrevocable member of Nouns DAO and entitled to one vote in all governance matters. ""You can participate in the auction here. ""Noun votes are non-transferable (if you sell your Noun the vote goes with it) but delegatable, which means you can assign your vote to someone else as long as you own your Noun. A minimum of 2 Nouns is required to submit proposals."

attributes.About: "Gitcoin is a platform where coders and developers can get paid to work on open-source software in a wide variety of programming languages. Users can also submit their own project ideas to the Gitcoin platform in order to crowdsource funding from contributing donors. Additionally, Gitcoin offers bounties, which allow users to crowdsource support from accessible developers on the Gitcoin platform to fund certain technological development issues. Gitcoin is a platform designed to foster the development of meaningful, open-source projects and better align the interests of donors and developers. The DAO enables building for the public, by the public by helping individuals and communities start, fund, and scale open-source projects."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. The developers can join the community by joining the discord where information about various open-source projects and bug bounties are shared. ""2. The Gitcoin token (GTC) is distributed to active participants in Gitcoin’s mission."
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Scott Moore, Co-founder of Gitcoin""He attended the University of Toronto from 2015 to 2016.""https://www.linkedin.com/in/notscottmoore?original_referer=""Kyle Weiss, Co-founder, DAO & Product Management Leader ""Kyle is an even-keel, inner-directed leader who is authentic in interactions while remaining modest and charitable. He is conscientious, with strong personal convictions, a self-deprecatory sense of humor, and a leadership style that showcases his ability to relate and listen. What you see is what you get, with no withholdings. His mentoring has led others to successful career transitions to product roles and he is always eager to bolster the community of product managers (especially in Colorado). He is ambitious to improve himself, to be "the best he can be" and is very detailed oriented as a result.""Kyle gravitates to technology and most things geeky. He understands the importance of delivering a valuable and impactful product that solves market problems. Currently, you can find Kyle taking web3 rockets to Quadratic Lands.""Kevin Owocki, Co-founder""He was the CEO of Gitcoin DAO, and he believes that crypto networks provide the perfect way to support open-source projects that change the world for the better, so much so that he describes emerging technology as a tool for a societal revolution.""Kevin Owocki | LinkedIn"
attributes.AdditionalInfo: "How does GitCoin make money?""How GitCoin and GitHub related?"

attributes.About:
"
Illuvium is an upcoming open-world exploration, NFT creature collector, and auto battler game. Illuvium Is a decentralized game studio and DAO that merges online gaming with crypto. It is an open-world RPG adventure game. Often touted as the first AAA game on Ethereum, Illuvium looks to provide a source of entertainment to both casual gamers and hardcore DeFi fans through a range of collecting and trading features. ""The game is a fusion between an open-world exploration game and a PVP battle game. Although Illuvium has blockchain-based elements, it is more of a full-fledged video game. It’s accessed through a downloadable desktop app, but also has a range of supporting DeFiapplications surrounding it — including a yield farm and decentralized exchange. Players roam the Illuvium landscape battling Illuvials and other players, participating in quests and daily challenges, and participating in its communal storyline.  The game will feature a variety of revenue streams, mostly derived from in-game purchases of items, crafting components, cosmetics, and shard curing. 100% of this revenue is distributed as rewards to those staking the ILV tokens through an ILV buyback system."
attributes.HowToJoin: " 1. Register an Illuvium Account. : https://play.illuvium.io/"" 2. Complete the Beta Application Form. "" 3. Join the Illuvium Discord server and actively participate in the discussion."" 4. Beta participants are selected based on their service."

attributes.About: "Rarible is a multi-chain platform where you can buy, sell, and create non-fungible tokens (NFTs). It is one of the main NFT marketplaces and is based on the Rarible Protocol, an open-source multichain community-governed NFT Protocol. It has been designated as the first community-owned NFT marketplace, with its native ERC-20 RARI token. Rarible’s first-mover advantage in the DeFi NFT sub-niche is the right choice, given that its ability to innovate has been demonstrated with its announced DeFi NFTs, fractional NFT ownership, and indexes.""The main goal of a DAO is to ensure that the platform’s users are in charge of making all decisions. In the case of Rarible, the RARI governance token is the basis. In this sense, RARI token holders will shape the future of the Rarible in the NFT space."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. $RARI token holders will be able to submit and vote on the proposals related to the Rarible Protocol, which, if approved, will be implemented by the RARI Foundation. ""1. $RARI is on centralized exchanges like Coinbase, Crypto.com, Kraken, and on decentralized exchanges like Uniswap.""https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/rarible/""1. Visit https://rari.foundation and connect any relevant wallets to see if you’re eligible to claim $RARI"
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Alex Salnikov""He is co-founder and head of product at Rarible. Alex had long considered the blockchain space a missed opportunity because of its inaccessibility to consumers unfamiliar with NFTs. In 2019 he started brainstorming about possible products to serve this need. Rarible grew out of the desire to create something fresh and user-friendly. He was also renowned financial professional and market strategist, he was also the co-founder with Ivan Starinin in 2014 of MarginCall. ""https://www.linkedin.com/in/salnikov1"

attributes.About:
"
It is a decentralized exchange built on Ethereum that utilizes an automated market making system rather than a traditional order-book. Instead of matching individual buy and sell orders, users can pool together two assets that are then traded against, with the price determined based on the ratio between the two. Sushiswap is a multi-chain DEX which gives user the flexibility of more than 16 blockchain networks and offers more features than others in the market. No KYC or mandatory identity verification which makes it easier for the user."
attributes.HowToJoin: "To get started on SushiSwap, create an Ethereum-based wallet. There are several kinds on the market, and some of the more popular ones include:""- MetaMask""- Coinbase Wallet""- Trust Wallet""Once you have your wallet set up, you’re ready to connect to the SushiSwap decentralized application (dapp). Though not required to get going, you could also get SUSHI tokens either using the DEX or centralized exchanges like Binance, FTX or Coinbase.""The token holders can vote on snapshot"" To become liquidity provider:"" - Go to SushiSwap and click on the liquidity tab."" - Connect your wallet and select “+ New Position.”"" - Select an even split of SUSHI and ETH tokens under “Confirm Adding Liquidity” and hit Approve."" - Receive your SUSHI-ETH LP tokens."

attributes.About: "API3’s stated goal is to allow decentralized versions of APIs to be built, managed and monetized at scales. It produces API information through a decentralized blockchain network of dual API-oracle nodes, with pooled insurance for bad replies. It is governed by data consumers & producers, and interested public. Smart contracts often struggle to access dependable data, but application programming interfaces (APIs) have been touted as a solution to this problem. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "The API3 project has a completely open, decentralized and direct governance model. Any API3 token holder can stake the DAO pool and obtain direct voting privileges in the DAO and thus participate in the governance of the project directly.""1. Access the DAO Dashboard.""2. Select Staking page from the navigation bar in the upper left hand corner.""3. Proceed to Staking Overview section below and connect to your wallet.""For more detailed tutorial on staking, visit https://docs.api3.org/dao-members/dashboard/staking.html""Join forum :  https://forum.api3.org/""Buy $API3 token : https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/api3/ "
attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Heikki Vanttinen
Heikki Vanttinen is the co-founder of API3. He graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration (BScBA) and degree in International Business. He also worked in various marketing positions before getting involved in the blockchain industry. At first, he was mainly responsible for strategic partnerships of different blockchain companies. After that, Vanttinen worked as the chief marketing officer at Zippie to promote blockchain technology. He is also the founder and former CEO of CLC Group
https://www.linkedin.com/in/heikki-vänttinen-83a86380
Burak Benligiray
Burak Benligiray is the co-founder and technical team lead of API3. Benligiray graduated with a Bachelor of Science (BSc) degree in electrical and electronics engineering. After that, Benligiray continued his studies and eventually received a PhD in the same specialization.He was a researcher for almost ten years in the span of his career. He also worked as the chief technology officer (CTO) for CLC group and Visea Innovative.
https://twitter.com/bbenligiray
Saša Milić
Saša Milić is the co-founder of API3 and co-author of the API3 whitepaper. Milić graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in computer science and statistics from the University of Toronto , then completed her master’s degree in applied computing. Milić was also a PhD student in Computer Science, where she performed research focusing on cognitive science. Milić has previously worked as a software engineer at Rubikoud Technologies and Facebook and as a simulation data scientist.
https://mobile.twitter.com/realsasamilic""https://www.linkedin.com/in/sasa-milic"

attributes.About: "Fei is a stablecoin protocol with inbuilt balancing properties such as minting upon demand, peg incentives, strong protocol control over collaterals, and proactive rebalancing. They help reduce the price volatility levels of cryptos in general, thus reducing risks and providing hedging opportunities within the industry.""The purpose of the Fei protocol is to create a liquid market where FEI/ETH can be traded closely to the ETH/USD pair. Unlike most other tokens, FEI's token supply is essentially unlimited. It's governed by the minter and burner contracts that control the token release through bonding curves and trade incentives."

attributes.About:
"
Silo is building technology so you can borrow any token using another securely. It is a non-custodial lending protocol for permission-less money markets. Silo's vision is to bring secure lending and borrowing markets to all tokens in the same way Uniswap brought liquidity pools to thousands of tokens, thereby enabling the use of any token as collateral.""A Silo is an isolated money market that supports only two assets, the bridge asset (e.g. ETH) and a unique token. When created, all Silos share the same collateral factors that can be configured for each Silo."

Badger is building an infrastructure to accelerate Bitcoin as collateral across blockchains. When you deposit Bitcoin in one of the many Badger DeFi products, Badger uses complex strategies to spread it across additional DeFi protocols like Curve and Yearn to earn high yields. The Badger community is one of the strongest group of builders who have steadfast commitment to bitcoin. The best part is that Community members can generate revenues by staying in-house."

attributes.About:
"
Instadapp platform is open to all and the platform focuses on helping developers design and launches dApps. Instadapp also functions as a bridge that helps aggregate several DeFi protocols, combining them into a single smart contract layer. Therefore, making it possible for Instadapp to offer users and developers unrestricted access to the full potential of the DeFi ecosystem. The INST token will align incentives with users, developers, and businesses to provide stewardship of Instadapp's future. The INST stakeholders will determine the evolution and direction of the Instadapp platform."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"Every user needs to create a Smart Account to interact with DeFi protocols through Instadapp. These DeFi Smart Accounts (DSAs) allow developers to build extensible use cases with maximum security and composability.""The protocol provides 3 methods to set up DSA:""- Create a Smart Account""- Fetch all Smart Accounts owned by an Ethereum address""- Set a Smart Account to be used for function calls ""The Authority Framework opens the DeFi Smart Account to new use cases with a modular account
authorization and contract-specific permissions. Developers can create new use cases around idle assets in DSA accounts, find ways to provide yield, or increase capital efficiency by developing new pathing or building automated account managers.""1. Engage with the Instadapp community, and share your proposal idea using the Governance forum and Discord. ""2. Find support through polls and off-chain signaling.""3. Submit a Development. ""4. Review with the Development Team to review and audit any code changes.""5. Submit a Proposal to the Instadapp DAO and gain support from INST holders.""To buy $INST : https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/instadapp/"

attributes.About:
"
Flamingo is an NFT- focused DAO that aims to explore emerging investment opportunities for ownable, blockchain-based assets. NFTs encompass digital art, collectibles, in-game assets, and other tangible assets. They can represent digital or real-world assets providing verifiable proof of authenticity and ownership. ""Flamingo aims to develop a strong foothold in this merging ecosystem, bringing together the “hive mind” of a DAO to the world of NFTs. Flamingo will give its members the availability to develop and deploy NFT-focused investment strategies"
attributes.HowToJoin: "If you’re interested in becoming a member of Flamingo, fill out the accreditation form. Once approved, you will have an opportunity to contribute and become a member. ""Accreditation form : https://flamingodao.xyz/verify-start""Each member will have the opportunity to contribute 60 ether to receive a 1% interest in Flamingo, which entitles a holder to 1% of Flamingo’s voting rights and profits. Membership is limited to a maximum of 9% or 540 ether per member. ""After contributing ether, there is a 7-day processing period to finish the approval of the application and fully execute the transaction. This is due to the nature of the Moloch 2 smart contracts, which have a default seven-day voting period and grace period to allow existing members to “rage quit” if they disagree with your membership."

"
Popcorn is a regenerative yield-optimizing protocol. It's easy to deposit crypto, optimize yield, and create a positive global impact at the same time. Popcorn seeks to be an innovative decentralized finance (DeFi) framework in which traders earn high yields while concurrently creating social impact. By utilizing Popcorn (POP) products, customers can obtain solutions that seek to initiate exceptional returns at a cost equivalent to other existing approaches while contributing to social impact initiatives for the public good. attributes.About:
"
Bankless DAO is a decentralized community to coordinate and propagates bankless media, culture, and education. Its goal is to drive adoption and awareness of truly bankless money systems like Ethereum, DeFi, and Bitcoin. They believe that with the invention of Ethereum and the subsequent crypto-money system, banks will become an outdated model for money management in the modern world and the blockchains would assume their position quite efficiently. ""Bankless DAO also aims to create a bespoke educational program concerning Perpetual Protocol, where the user will have the opportunity to learn through a structured path. The final goal is offering the community a tool to self-evaluate the level of understanding of Perpetual Protocol’s functionalities and their potential. At the end of the path, users should be able to assess Perpetual’s value proposition and be ready to test its amazing tools."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join the DAO discord server. ""2. Following a brief verification and onboarding process, you can get a free guest pass from a Level 2 contributor to explore the server which expires after 14 days (can be renewed). ""3. Subscribe, bookmark, and follow along to receive updates and news from the community. ""4. Find a guild or project and begin joint meetings. ""5. Make a positive impression on the community by delivering work.""Requirement of number of $BANK tokens for a different roles as a member:""Member : 35,000 BANK""Contributor: 35,000 BANK + Nomination/Vote process""Whale: 150,000 BANKLiquidity ""Provider: 250 Uniswap V2 BANK/ETH LP tokens""Here’s how to join and participate to become a member in the genesis season of the Bankless DAO:""Check your eligibility - Any address that holds a 2020 or 2021 badge is eligible""Claim BANK tokens -If you have an Ethereum address that meets the eligibility requirements go to the Bankless DAO website, connect your wallet using Metamask or WalletConnect, and claim BANK participation tokens.""Note: BANK tokens are valueless tokens — they are only used for access to the DAO discord and to vote in DAO proposals""Buy $BANK here ""Join Discord - The Bankless DAO discord is a platform where DAO members congregate to discuss the talents they can bring to the DAO as well as to coordinate around governance and proposals. This discord requires a specified amount of BANK tokens to access all the channels""Share your skills - Tell the DAO how you can help it achieve its mission. When you join the Bankless Discord go to the #intros channel and share your skills and how you can contribute to the DAO. We expect the DAO to need developers, planners, writers, content producers, analysts, meme artists, and community managers. ""Vote on Genesis Proposal - After claiming BANK and joining the discord you can vote in governance proposals. The first item for a vote is the Genesis Proposal which has been put forward by RSA and David Hoffman. Read the proposal and vote YES or NO using SnapShot."

attributes.About:
"
Ampleforth runs a stablecoin of elastic supply by demand. Ampleforth aims to introduce AMPL, an elastic token, and build out Elastic Finance. Ampleforth, however, differs from other stablecoins in its method of maintaining price stability. Instead of relying on deposits or issuing and redeeming debt, the software programmatically adjusts the supply of its AMPL cryptocurrency every 24 hours in a process called “rebasing.” The Forth DAO is a DAO dedicated solely to the growth and adoption of AMPL. "

attributes.About: "Lucidao is a DAO which aims to gather a community of oracles and users to build the infrastructure to facilitate the bridging of crypto and real worlds. The final goal is to go beyond the common belief that cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology are only speculative assets by driving mass adoption and trust through utility. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "Join the Discord server to share feedback on community experiences, report bugs, discuss proposals and share yours! Lucidao welcomes members of the community who contribute and provide value for the broader team by contributing to the community. It allows anyone holding LCD tokens to participate and vote for their opinions.""Anybody with 1% of LCD delegated to their address can propose a governance action; these are simple or complex sets of actions, such as adding support for a dapp, changing a Timelock variable, or changing any other parameter or variable of the Lucidao ecosystem that the Governance can modify. All proposals are subject to a 3 day voting period, and any address with voting power can vote for or against the proposal. Access the Lucidao Forum here."

attributes.About: "PleasrDAO is a collective of DeFi leaders, early NFT collectors and digital artists who acquire culturally significant pieces with a charitable twist. The DAO has evolved its mission to collect digital art that represents and funds important ideas, movements and causes that have been memorialized on-chain as NFTs.""It is experimenting with novel concepts in digital and community art ownership. Its members are exploring ideas such as fractionalizing iconic pieces to be distributed to, and owned by, the community. However, beyond just shared ownership of these pieces, the collective plans to apply creative innovations within DeFi to add and disseminate value. In essence, the DAO aims to buy and fund culturally significant pieces and then create something fundamentally additive to the soul of the piece before sharing it back with the community."
attributes.HowToJoin: "PleasrDAO distributes ownership in the form of tokens. Members hold NFTs representing any artworks and funds in the treasury.""If someone chooses to leave PleasrDAO, then their tokens will automatically become for sale internally within the DAO. Furthermore, the governance of the organization is orchestrated through a group chat."

attributes.About: "Aavegotchi is a community-owned NFT gaming protocol, enabling gamers true ownership of their gaming assets. Aavegotchi is a DeFi-enabled crypto collectibles game developed by Singapore-based Pixelcraft Studios that allows players to stake Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) avatars with interest-generating tokens and interact with the Aavegotchi metaverse. Aavegotchis are pixelated ghosts that live on the Ethereum blockchain, backed by the ERC721 standard. ""Aavegotchi is governed by AavegotchiDAO that manages all funds generated through the GHST token distribution."

attributes.About: "The Nation3 DAO aims to reimagine nation-states and form a nation of individuals on the cloud, with NFT passport membership based on ownership of locked native tokens and ecosystem contribution. It aims to gather interested builders, creators and artists who will promote together the vision of a blockchain-embedded, trans-state nation, seeking a peaceful, safer and more liberated future for humanity. ""Nation3 is building a Web3-powered, tax-free, solarpunk cloud nation, with a view of obtaining physical territories further down the line. Historically, traditional nation states currently have had a monopoly over services they provide. Their vision is to unbundle that and gradually build or invest in products and services that allow Citizens to be actively involved in economic activity and have a high quality of life."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"Get $NATION - the governance token of the DAO. You can either buy some here, or you can earn it by completing some of the openly available tasks on Dework.""Once you have $NATION, you can lock it in exchange for $veNATION - the non-transferrable, time-locked version of the token that grants you governance weight and gives you access to token-gated channels. If you hold a minimum of 2 $veNATION, you can become a Genesis Citizen by grabbing one of the only 420 Genesis Passports.""Once you are a Citizen (or, for now, a holder of a minimal $veNATION balance) you will be able to verify yourself on our community discord and get access to all channels. This will also unlock the rest of Citizen-only Dework tasks.""If you already hold $NATION, head over to https://app.nation3.org/lock to lock it for a period from 1 week to 4 years. You can read more about the benefits, financial incentives, and governance responsibilities of holding $veNATION here: https://wiki.nation3.org/token/#venation ""If you don't have $NATION, you can buy it here: https://app.balancer.fi/#/trade/ether/0x333a4823466879eef910a04d473505da62142069""For now, any amount of $veNATION above 0.1 is sufficient to access token-gated Discord channels. However, they will soon migrate access to NFT Passport holders only (you can get yours with a min balance of 2 $veNATION). Once you hold $veNATION, head over to #guild-join channel in Discord and click Join Nation3 to get verified.
""Access the forum here."

attributes.About: "NFTX is a platform for creating liquid markets for illiquid Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). The project was born out of a need to lower the knowledge barrier to NFT investing and address the lack of liquidity and transparency in the space. Users deposit their NFT into an NFTX vault and mint a fungible ERC20 token (vToken) that represents a claim on a random asset from within the vault. vTokens can also be used to redeem a specific NFT from a vault. NFTX's mission is to become the primary issuer of NFT vault tokens, allowing anyone to trade & invest in NFT markets without needing the underlying knowledge and expertise required.""NFTX is built and maintained by NFTX DAO. The NFTX token is the governance token that community members use to vote on proposals and steer the direction of the DAO."
attributes.HowToJoin: "NFTX proposal ideas are discussed in the NFTX Discord, the NFTX Forum, and the governance calls. The NFTX token holders have a vote in any decisions that are made. Read the Blog here to stay updated."

attributes.About: "Sarcophagus is a decentralized ‘dead man's switch’ application built on Ethereum and Arweave. A dead man's switch is a mechanism that triggers when the user fails to perform an action. Using smart contracts and decentralized file storage, the project aims to make secret recovery easier. Its targeted use cases include, will & trust, password recovery, emergency communication etc. Files you place in a sarcophagus are only unlocked in the event of you failing to attest to the contract. ""The project uses a multi-DAO structure, with an Aragon DAO at the centre and four sub-DAOs for different operations, namely: payroll, ambassadors, liquidity and growth. The SARCO token is the primary unit of exchange in the network used to pay an Archaeologist for their resurrection services and in posting a bond by Archaeologist.""How it works- Any user wanting to make sure certain information could be recovered if they were to pass away, or loose access to their account, can create a Sarcophagus and store those files inside. Storing the file inside the Sarcophagus is known as Mummifying them. When Mummifying a file through the Sarcophagus dApp the file is encrypted and uploaded to Arweave. Arweave generates a transaction ID for every transaction and every file uploaded. The user who creates the Sarcophagus is known as the Creator or Embalmer.""Upon creation of the Sarcophagus, the Embalmer also sets a Recipient, a Resurrection Time and a Bounty. The Resurrection Time is the time at which, and after, the file can be decrypted again. If this time needed to be updated by the Embalmer they would then have to sign a new message with their wallet on the Sarcophagus dApp, known as Re-Wrapping, in order to extend the Resurrection Time and maintain having all their data still locked away securely and accessible only to themselves.""If the Resurrection Time is reached then the Sarcophagus is eligible to be decrypted and have its contents sent to the Recipient. The recipient is set and identified by their public Ethereum address. The Bounty is what the Embalmer pays for the service. It is quoted to them when creating the Sarcophagus, after inputting all their settings. It is paid in SARCO tokens. The Sarcophagi are decrypted by the nodes (aka computers) running the Sarcophagus DAO software, known in the protocol as the Archeologists. These Archeologists are incentivised to decrypt the messages by getting rewarded with the Bounty."

attributes.About:
"
Unlock is a protocol developers, creatores and platforms can use to create memberships. Unloclk’s goal is to ease implementation and increase conversion from “users” to “member”, creating a much healthier monetization environment for the web. The platform seeks to provide a helpful way to decrease friction, improve conversion rate, and lower costs while aligning interests between consumers and creators. Unlock(UDT) allows the creation of NFTs with superpowers: perks, utility, access, and benefits on the web.Unlock is an open-source, collectively owned, community-governed, peer-to-peer system that crates timebased memberships. There are a number of independent components of Unlock like Unlock Labs, Unlock Protocols, The Unlock Ecosystem, Unlock DAO, Unlock tools."

attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Julien Genestoux

attributes.About:
"
Tornado Cash is a decentralized, non-custodial, open-source protocol for permissionless anonymous token transactions. It is managed by its token holders and serves privacy and compliance. On August 8th, 2022, the United States Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) accused Tornado of "laundering" more than $7 billion of cryptocurrencies since its creation in 2019, claiming the protocol was used by malicious hackers. This was the second act of its kind, following the precedent of similar sanctions issued on the Blender.io crypto mixer in May 2022. OFAC has frozen any activity on Tornado Cash and sanctioned crypto wallets associated with it, and on
related smart contracts."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"1.Join the community via Discord 
But the company is blacklisted by the US Department of Treasury"
attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Alexey Pertsev
The founder and developer of Tornado Cash. On 10 August 2022, Alexey Pertsev was arrested in Amsterdam on the suspicion of "involvement in concealing criminal financial flows and facilitating money laundering through the mixing of cryptocurrencies through the decentralized Ethereum mixing service Tornado Cash.
https://twitter.com/alex_pertsev"
attributes.title: Tornado Cash

attributes.About: """PieDAO is an asset management platform and a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) for governing tokenized portfolio allocations. DOUGH is the token that governs the platform.""The DAO is focused on bringing market accessibility and economic empowerment to anyone through tokenized asset allocations called PIEs where weights are collectively governed by DAO members, allowing users to frictionlessly get exposure to different allocations."
attributes.HowToJoin: "DOUGH is the Pie DAO governance token. Owning DOUGH makes you a member of Pie DAO. Holders are capable of participating in the DAO’s governance votes and proposing votes of their own. One needs to create token request in order to participate in the governance of Pie DAO. ""Your Token Request was created, and you could decide to withdraw it at any time before it gets approved or declined. It is now up to the DAO members to initiate a vote and approve or decline the Token Request you just created. "
attributes.FoundingTeam: """Alessio Delmonti""Alessio Delmonti is the founder and core developer of Pie DAO. He is also the founder of WIT technology limited. attributes.About: """Inverse Finance is a decentralized platform for lending, borrowing, and creating synthetic assets INV. is used to govern Inverse Finance products and can be used to vote for future upgrades.""Inverse DAO governs and develops a suite of permissionless and decentralized financial tools using blockchain smart contract technology. attributes.About: "“Making Austin the Crypto Capital of the World.”""ATX DAO is a local DAO working to unite Austin's crypto communities, enable local artists and businesses to participate in the crypto ecosystem, and educate the government about the benefits of Web3. Their mission is to develop the city as a leader in the Web3 economy. The DAO organizes social events, provides Web3 expertise to the local government, and assists in the creation of new Web3 projects."
attributes.HowToJoin: "There are various ways to contribute to the DAO-:""1. Proposal Forum- Open discussion of all current and previous initiatives being pursued by the DAO.""2. Snapshot Voting- On-Chain governance for the DAO. All current and previous proposals and their voting turnout.""3. Core Team- The DAO operates based on committees. Each committee has a democratically elected head, with elections happening twice a year.""4. Dework Board- Some of the tasks for the DAO are eligible to win REP tokens. This is a way for ATX DAO to recognize the work of the community and to build “sweat equity”. The REP leaderboard at the bottom of the team page highlights top contributors. These tasks are open to all members of the community, not only DAO members. Community members get the chance to earn REP tokens to exchange them for a membership NFT, while DAO members can exchange their REP tokens for the chance to be paid in USDC for the work done for the DAO. ATX uses Dework to create, assign, and verify tasks.""1. Discord Channel- Join the discord channel to participate in discussions.""ATX DAO membership NFT gets access to exclusive member-only events and networking groups along with all the benefits from partnerships in the future and access to the member-only Discord channels. ""DAO membership is an application based and there are two membership rounds annually. The next round will be in Jan/Feb. Members get exclusive access to private events, discounted or free tickets to flagship events, and other benefits."

attributes.About: "KaramelaDAO is a for-profit DAO that issues and distributes a digital currency called Lollipop ($loll). They experiment with new technologies and new concepts and try to push the limits of what is possible in the crypto space. Inside Karamela you will find Teams and Projects, with goals that range from education to profitability."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"There are two roles in the DAO:""1. Citizens- They hold 1 of the only 300 NFT-stocks of Karamela DAO. You can still mint one at OMGdrops.com Marketplace. Granted Citizenships can also be found and resold after mint, in all major marketplaces like Opensea, Rarible etc. Occasionally, active Bakers are also rewarded with a free NFT Citizenship. This is done by voting.""Citizenships are also awarded to extraordinary people that supported the DAO. Check out Bounties for tasks that need to be completed.""1. Bakers- They are the workers and community of DAO, who hold the crypto-token $lollipop. To become a baker, join Discord server. Participate in an Onboarding Call and you’ll be granted with $lollipop that you can use to participate, vote and propose new motions. These temporary Citizenships will be deactivated when the DAO moves from the Genesis phase to the next one.""You would need a Metamask Wallet to participate. Set up one using the link here. Make sure you don’t use a Coinbase/Kraken/Exchange address. The coins will be lost. Use Metamask only.""Then go to #collabland channel, in discord and hit “Let’s Go” button.
Follow the directions and connect your wallet. This will redirect you to Collab.land page.
After that you should be granted your Baker role, and the Citizen-Only Channels will be revealed."

attributes.About: "The Token Engineering Commons (TEC) is an open source and collectively governed project that aims to create a token economy that will accelerate the responsible & ethical creation of public goods within the TE community. The Token Engineering Commons is divided into 11 Working Groups that collaborate horizontally and represent the cultural build of the TEC, implemented to promote their Vision: advance token engineering through enabling the creation of ethical, safe, resilient and diverse economic systems to benefit societies around the world.""Token Engineering is an emerging engineering discipline focused on holistic systems design and the theory, practice and tools used to design and verify tokenized ecosystems."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Working Groups are: Stewards, SoftGov, Legal, Transparency, Omega, Gravity, Parameters, Comms, Commons Swarm, Labs, Communitas. The workgroup website page provides information and TEC calendar provides the schedule for all WG calls. All calls are open to anyone to join.""There are two ways to contribute to the DAO:""1. Contribute your talent and time.""- Join the Orientation call, every Wednesday, 7am PST / 6pm CET on the Community hall channel on Discord.""- Join the next Community Call on Thursday, 9am PST / 8pm CET on the Community hall channel on Discord. Add one or more to your calendar.""- Stay up to date by following the TEC on Twitter, Youtube and Medium.""- Have a look around their Sprint board and comment on any issues that you think you can help with.""1. Acquire $TEC- It allows you to steer the TEC while directly supporting its mission. Here’s how to acquire the token.""To submit a Proposal- Access the forum here. Share it on the TEC Forum for Advice Process here. After the Commons Upgrade, you will then be able to submit the same proposal to Conviction Voting for community approval."

attributes.About: "JournoDAO is a professional network of journalists exploring Web3 technology, with the intention of cultivating a healthier media landscape. Between uncensorable, distributed storage of media, and greater means for creators to own and monetize their content, they hope to incubate and develop new journalistic practices native to web3.""They’re looking to build a community to explore some of the most exciting questions to face journalism in a generation, such as- What does a more decentralized newsroom/editorial process look like? How can blockchains and Web3 tools be used to increase transparency in the process of doing journalism, interacting with sources and readers? How can DAOs and Web3 be used to create new business models for journalism or enhance traditional models?"

attributes.About: "Perpetual Protocol is an open source software project to create powerful financial tools available to all. Perpetual Protocol's core product is a perpetual futures DEX (decentralized exchange) which runs on the blockchain. Traders use it to permissionlessly trade the most popular product in crypto. Builders create new protocols and projects on top of it. Liquidity providers utilize it to earn yield on their capital. Their goal is to create the world's best, most accessible and most secure decentralized derivatives trading platform.""Perpetual DAO is the organization guiding the long-term direction of the project, which controls the DAO treasury including PERP tokens, and of which all PERP holders are members with voting rights."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Subscribe to the newsletter here. ""Participate in discussions on the Discord server or access the governance forum here.""The PERP token is used by its holders to vote on governance proposals. The governance forum is the main place to propose and discuss the pros and cons of new ideas. Snapshot, an external off-chain voting platform, is used to get input from the community. Buy here."

attributes.About:
"
Dtravel is a web3 direct booking(peer-to-peer) solution that makes it simple to reserve holiday rentals directly. Dtravel provides greater ownership, lower fees, and more control by blending the liberties of direct booking sites with the ease of online travel companies. Transparency is maintained with the community. Lower fees, greater flexibility and unrestricted communications create a better travel booking experience for everyone."
attributes.HowToJoin: "They are currently in the process of developing an onboarding plan that will empower the Dtravel community to contribute to the future of the ecosystem. Dtravel v2 enables guests to complete on-chain bookings via a host's direct listing URL that allows entry to the DTravel 2 community and contribute to the guest experience. Users can join the community through their: Dtravel  and Discord"

attributes.About:
"
Airswap is a peer-to-peer exchange protocol and decentralized financial system that enables traders to find parties to deal in direct (and private) negotiation and carry out transactions with no risk and no infrastructure beyond Ethereum. The price you see is the price you get, without any manipulation. With the help of Ethereum price prediction, one can easily plan whether he/she should buy or invest."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"Once you’ve joined the AirSwap Discord, tag the Ops role to chat with someone who can help set you up with a Contributor role. ""You’ll then be able to join contributor groups in the #join channel. Although each group does unique work, each is in constant communication with one another, and members are often shared.
Users can join the community through their Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ecQbV7H ""
Projects can be found as well as proposed on GitHub and labeled by group and skills. Some projects are best presented as AirSwap Improvement Proposals (AIPs) to gain community support."

Don Mosites has 2 current jobs as Lead Product Manager at ConsenSys and Co-Founder at AirSwap. Additionally, he has had 5 past jobs including Co-Founder and CTO at Fluidity.""LinkedIn ""Michael Oved, Founding member
He is passionate about a future where people fearlessly trade digital value without third-party intervention. He is also a Mathematician, trader, and technologist. Prior to AirSwap, he spent his career as an algo trader at Virtu Financial.""LinkedIn"

attributes.About: "Fingerprints is a global community and DAO that champions blockchain art. It collects art, commissions new works, and supports projects by innovative artists— all of which explore the creative possibilities of blockchain. It is passionate about fostering experimentation and educating the world about this emerging field of artistic practice and the technology that underpins it."
attributes.HowToJoin: "There are four ways to join the DAO-""1. Community- Access to public Discord and forum discussions""2. Drop Holders- Who hold at least 1 NFT from Studio get access to in-person community events, earlier access to future drops from Fingerprints Studio.""3. Token Holders- Who hold Up to 5,000 $PRINTS get the ability to vote on formal proposals, exposure to The Fingerprints Collection.""4. Members- Who hold 5,000+ $PRINTS get full membership privileges, access to private channels, ability to submit proposals, and influence major DAO decisions. To join as a member, one must acquire at least 5,000 $PRINTS. You can acquire $PRINTS at the following link: https://join.fingerprintsdao.xyz. In order to access private communications channels, visit the #join-here channel of the Fingerprints Discord and follow the steps provided by Collab.Land.""Access the forum here."

attributes.About: "LeagueDAO is a decentralized open source project developing Web3 Fantasy Sports and Gaming Protocols. The continued development of the dApps is provided by the core team and governed by the community through the DAO. LeagueDAO enables a global community of fans to collectively play, build, and define the future of fantasy gaming. They combine DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats."
attributes.HowToJoin: "- Join the Discord server to participate in the DAO. ""- Access the forum here.""- LeagueDAO is governed by the $LEAG token. Through the governance platform, $LEAG token holders get to determine the DAO's roadmap, game models, which sports to include, prize and reward structure and well as the use of the DAO's treasury. Holders of one of their NFTs or the $LEAG governance token claim roles via the #collabland-join channel. ""- Participate in the weekly AMA calls via the Community AMA Audio Channel on Discord, usually every Friday."

attributes.About: "Botto is a generative artist governed by the Botto DAO. Botto creates 350 art pieces a week and presents them to the community. These art pieces are considered a 'series', whereby individual art pieces are denoted as 'fragments'. The community votes on these art fragments. Votes represent individual preferences on what a participant considers to be aesthetically pleasing art. Collectively, votes are used as feedback for Botto's generative algorithm - dictating what direction Botto should take its next series of art pieces.  Over time, Botto shall create art guided and governed by the community. Once a week, Botto puts one art fragment to auction on SuperRare. All auction proceeds are returned to the community. While the auction takes place, Botto produces a new series comprising of art fragments, so that the cycle can continue."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Set up an Ethereum wallet.""2. Fund that wallet with Ether (Ξ or ETH).""3. Get some BOTTO tokens.""4. Stake (deposit) these BOTTO tokens onto the Botto app.""5. Vote on your favorite art pieces here.""Get BOTTO On Uniswap. Here’s a step-by-step guide if you need help."
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Mario Klingemann, Founder""Quasimondo (aka Mario Klingemann) designed Botto based on a whitepaper he wrote back in 2018. He is the only person who works with the AI part of the code and enforces the rule for Botto that there be no direct human interference with the creations. As such, his only work is to adjust the way votes are implemented to ensure Botto is learning as best as possible. Quasimondo is also responsible for adding new capabilities, if and when that happens."

attributes.About: "FreeRoss DAO is an organization fighting for the freedom of Ross Ulbricht, and governed by holders of the FREE token, a token that represents fractional ownership in the artistic works of Ross Ulbricht. It seeks to further three objectives-""1. Help free Ross- Ross Ulbricht is currently sentenced to, as he puts it, death in prison – for creating a website. They seek to rectify this injustice.""2. Advance prison reform- Once Ross has won back his freedom, the fight against injustice will have only just begun.""3. Share Ross’s work- They will share Ross’s work with the world and give everyone a unique opportunity to own a piece of it."
attributes.HowToJoin: "- Fill out the Onboarding Form.""- To earn $FREE check out the bounty board.""- If you have a bounty you'd like to suggest or a project you'd like to run suggest in #ideas-and-feedback on Discord.""- If you already hold $FREE, set up Noble at https://join.freerossdao.com/.""- Members with relevant skills volunteer to administrate specific tasks. Currently the DAO consists of the following working groups: Operations, Treasury, Marketing and NFTs. If you would like participate submit your proposal in #share-your-skills on Discord.""- Anyone can draft a proposal and submit to the relevant working group for feedback. Once it has been edited into a formal proposal it is sent to the Advisory Council. If the council approves the proposal it is sent to Snapshot for a vote. Community members vote using the $FREE governance token."

attributes.About: "PoolTogether is a blockchain protocol for prize savings that enables the creation of “no-loss” lotteries. Anyone can purchase a ticket for 1 Dai and at the end of the week, a winner is selected. However, instead of receiving the funds from the lottery tickets, PoolTogether takes the money from ticket sales and allocates those funds into a lending protocol like Compound that earns interest on the deposits. Each week, the winner of the lottery receives the combined interest of all the funds and participants retain their initial contributions. Control of the PoolTogether Protocol rests solely in the hands of the community holding the POOL tokens."
attributes.HowToJoin: "The PoolTogether protocol is open source, free software that is deployed on blockchains and managed and controlled by the POOL token holders. Changes to the protocol are submitted as governance proposals. Anyone who either holds 10,000 POOL tokens (0.1% of total supply) OR has 10,000 POOL tokens delegated to them can submit a governance proposal. Acquire POOL tokens here.""If you wish to get involved, here are some ways:""- Visit dao.pooltogether.com""- Read "How to Get Involved Guide"""- Apply for a grant here.""- Share ideas on the governance forum.""- Join Discord""- Work on Bounties""- Join a Swim Team""- Suggest Bounties"

attributes.About:
"
The Ethernaut DAO is a common goods organization that aims to convert developers into Ethernauts. The Ethernaut DAO is open for everyone willing to contribute by sharing their knowledge and know-how, or to simply broaden their horizons and learn together with the best. The Ethernauts, developers already exploring the ether, seek out to solve this imbalance and flip the supply deficiency by combining their forces and knowledge. With the right incentives, can rapidly transform senior developers into senior Solidity developers.""Ethernaut is a Web3/Solidity based wargame inspired by overthewire, to be played in the Ethereum Virtual Machine. Each level is a smart contract that needs to be 'hacked'. The game acts both as a tool for those interested in learning Ethereum, and as a way to catalogue historical hacks as levels. There can be an infinite number of levels and the game does not require to be played in any particular order."

Float Protocol is building the decentralized monetary system of the future. At the heart
of the protocol is the FLOAT token. It is designed to be the first truly native internet
currency. FLOAT tracks a digital asset instead of trying to exactly match the price of a dollar. It is designed to change value over time corresponding to your digital purchasing power. The protocol utilizes ERC-20 token called BANK for governance and in the stabilization mechanism of the stablecoin. It has two tokens system which is BANK and FLOAT. attributes.About:
"
Arweave is a new type of storage that backs data with sustainable and continuous grants, allowing users and developers to truly store data forever – for the very first time. As a collectively owned hard drive that never forgets, Arweave allows us to remember and preserve valuable information, apps, and history indefinitely. By preserving history, it prevents others from rewriting it. On top of the Arweave network lives the permaweb: a global, community-owned web that anyone can contribute to or get paid to maintain. The community is decentralized and growing. The community’s core team channels include Arweave Dev, Arweave Miners, and Arweave Chat."

attributes.About:
"
Bancor is the only DeFi trading and staking protocol with Single-Sided Liquidity. Bancor is the only decentralized staking protocol that allows you to earn money with single-token exposure and full protection from temporary loss.  The protocol token used on the network is the “Bancor Network Token,” BNT. The protocol’s token allows traders to provide liquidity for the pools available on the network. Overseen by the Bancor DAO, the protocol's mission is to bring DeFi mainstream by providing the simplest and safest way to trade and earn passive income in DeFi. Bancor invented the first automated market maker (AMM) Liquidity pool in 2017. Bancor is the preferred treasury and liquidity management solution of many DAOs including Polygon, Synthetix, UMA, Paraswap, Nexus Mutual, KeeperDAO, BarnBridge & WOO Network DAO."

attributes.About:
"
Bao Finance is an open-source community-driven project that functions on L2 DeFi. Bao creates a multi-network suite of applications that provide services to DeFi users regardless of their preferred chains. The product has launched a franchise model of Bao farms, BaoSwap, and Bao Synths deployed to chains like xDai, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon. Users can create synthetic assets within BAO Finance using their LP tokens from other protocols. Synthetic assets are tokenized derivatives(an asset whose value is driven by the underlying asset or index) that mimic the value of another asset. Bao is creating a multinetwork suite of applications that will provide services to DeFi users regardless of their preferred chains. It has Franchise components like Bao Mainnet, BaoSwap, Pandaswap, and Polly Finance."

attributes.About:
"
BrightID is a social identity network that allows you to prove that you’re only using one account. The company's platform allows people to prove to applications that they aren't using multiple accounts and solves the unique identity problem through the creation and analysis of a social graph, enabling clients to secure social identity networks. It suggests peer-based membership for trusted user identification before dApps without storing their personal data. It’s the holy grail of digital identity. It is used for Universal Basic Income, Voting/Polling. E-commerce. It is a powerful community led by people with a diverse set of talents to make BrightID stronger"
attributes.HowToJoin: "As a $BRIGHT holder, you can vote on initiatives in BrightDAO . "
City DAO is building a network of assets on the chain, starting with a single parcel of land in Wyoming. Each parcel of land is an NFT that can be owned collectively by the DAO or by individuals. They offer various guilds which are organized pools of diverse contributors and talented people from around the world. City DAO offers various guilds like Resource guilds(Design, Development), Functional guilds(Community, Legal, Education, grants, media). Enzyme Finance is a protocol for DeFi investment strategies and asset management. Its non-custodial Vaults allow user-created DeFi strategies that leverage a composable variety of integrated DeFi tools. Enzyme Finance is an Ethereum-based protocol for decentralized on-chain asset management. It is a platform for people or entities to manage their wealth within a customizable and safe environment. Enzyme aims to enable anyone to set up, manage, and invest in customized investment vehicles. The platform aims to change the landscape of asset management by eliminating barriers. Enzyme enables you to retain custody assets at all times and provides full transparency. "

attributes.About: "With the aim of building the world’s largest community of decentralized exchange users, the Nectar token (NEC) enables governance and platform loyalty functionalities for decentralized exchanges. The nectar community is the main hub where NEC token holders, via the necDAO, are able to propose and vote on the future direction of integrated platforms, starting with the DeversiFi decentralized exchange platform."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Nectar is listed on multiple exchanges to promote discovery and liquidity such as Uniswap. In order to participate, users will essentially “stake” their NEC by sending them to the necDAO in exchange for “Reputation” (voting power). There are two ways you can dive in, and engage with the necDAO:""1. Become a member""Anyone can become a voting member of necDAO and enjoy the right to determine proposals. Reputation refers to the membership and assigned voting power within necDAO. It is not a token and cannot be transferred or used outside the system.""2. Become a proposer""Anyone can submit a proposal to necDAO provided it serves the Nectar ecosystem. Unlike proposals related to Nectar itself or the DAO, proposals directly relating to the functioning of the DeversiFi exchange will be subject to approval from the DeversiFi team.""There are many ways you can claim your Reputation:""- Submit a successful proposal. You earn Reputation when submitting successful proposals.""- Stake Nectar tokens. Staking Nectar will result in the most Reputation and is the recommended method.""- Claim an initial airdrop. This one-off event will airdrop Reputation to on-chain Nectar holders.""- Buy it in a GEN auction. You can bid for Reputation using GEN tokens during the initial bootstrap phase."
attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Will Harborne, Initiator""Will is also the founder of DeversiFi.
https://twitter.com/will_harborne"

attributes.About:
"
PrimeDAO is an open finance system based on programmable money that is being realized on Ethereum. The company develops tools that transform Defi into a collaborative ecosystem. PrimeDAO is a collective of leading DeFi builders and researchers focused on enhancing decentralized control and coordination. The Prime app provides a range of services to digital organizations throughout the entire cycle from initiation (Launch) to growth (Pools) and maturity (Deals). Some of the most respected and active builders groups have aligned under the Prime umbrella, including Curve Labs, Kolektivo Labs, Blockscience, and Token Engineering Commons."

attributes.About: """Spice DAO, a decentralized autonomous organization formed to buy Alejandro Jodorowsky's storyboard collection known as the "Dune Bible", unfortunately for Spice DAO, the auctioneer was not accepting offers in crypto, so announced its plan to dissolve and pay out holders of the Spice token in ETH. The Spice has ceased to flow. These spice heads had big plans to convert the book into NFTs, burn the physical copy, and adapt the story into an animated series. There’s just one problem, the purchase didn't mean they actually own the copyright to Dune. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Twitter -- https://twitter.com/thespicedao""2. One can buy the $SPICE tokens by buying Ethereum as the base token and connecting the wallet."
attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Soban “Soby” Saqib
Co-founded by Soban “Soby” Saqib and a small group of other crypto enthusiasts to win the auction of a rare copy of the Jodorowsky production manual for a failed earlier production of Dune. The DAO raised a total of roughly $12 million in cryptocurrency last year. When Saqib won a November auction for the equivalent of $2.9 million, that left a huge surplus of money."

attributes.About:
"
United Planets DAO (UPDAO) is the overarching governance entity of the @Metahero_Universe. The UPDAO is a diversified community of talented engineers, product managers, and NFT/web3 investors, with a Great Sailing spirit in mind. UPDAO aims to leverage the Web3 ecosystem by producing both for-profit and non-profit projects founded and jointly managed by diverse youngsters throughout the world. UPDAO also provides training and mentorship for its members and funding for internal projects. Their motto is to focus on NFTs with rights and benefits, not pure arts and games, and to be a strong and effective DAO, not necessarily big."
