attributes.About: "Lixir Finance is a protocol focussed on automating and optimizing concentrated liquidity management. Lixir sets out to integrate the next generation of Automated Market Makers (AMMs) that offer the ability to provide liquidity in a tight range, such as Uniswap V3."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Join Discord to participate in discussion.""$LIX is the protocol governance token. By time-locking $LIX, users receive $veLIX which is eligible for governance rights as well as a cut of protocol revenue. Get LIX on exchanges such as Uniswap."

attributes.About: "CurioDAO is a project built on the Ethereum network as well as Polkadot that is open-sourced. It enables investors to purchase tokens directly backed by exclusive collectible cars. This project is governed by CGT tokenholders. CGT holders handle the Creator Protocol and maintain the resilience, transparency, and efficiency of the Curio Stablecoin (CSC). The Creator Protocol, which was developed on Polkadot as well as ETH blockchain, allows users to develop a new coin. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "CGT holders can cast votes on actions to be taken on the Creator Protocol. Get $CGT here.""Join Telegram to participate in discussions."

""https://www.linkedin.com/in/rverboonen/""Valerie Halter, COO and Co-founder""Previously she co-founded a firm that specialized in elite investment opportunities for (ultra-)high-net-worth individuals. attributes.About: "MetaClanDAO is a next generation video game guild focused on enhanced play-to-earn mechanics. It is a collective of crypto gamers, technologists, and developers that aims to create a decentralised mechanism through which eSports communities can come together across multiple NFT-based games. Players will share insights, value, and skills to drive the web3 gaming space forwards. By working directly with both players and developers, MetaClan stands to stimulate the growth of individual gaming communities as well as the broader web3 gaming ecosystem."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Joining MetaClan requires:""- A web3 wallet like MetaMask or WalletConnect""- $1 in ETH to cover transaction costs""- DAI to pledge as tribute- Acquire DAI using Uniswap or KyberSwap""To gain access to the DAO, simply visit this link and do the following:""Step 1: In the top right, select Sign In and connect with either MetaMask or WalletConnect""Step 2: Select Proposals (bottom left) and look for the button which says + New Proposal in the top right hand of the screen.""Step 3: On the list of proposal types, select Member.""Step 4: Fill out your membership application. For important points to keep in mind while filling this out, click here. Please note that you will have to Unlock Dai by accepting a transaction prior to being able to submit your proposal. Once unlocked, click Submit at the bottom of the page.""Step 5: Accept the transaction and navigate to the Unsponsored Proposal section. You will see your proposal in the Open section, and now need someone to champion it to go into the official voting queue. Join the Discord and let someone know that you are ready to be championed in the #discussion channel.""Step 6: Sit back and relax! Your proposal is now subject to voting by the rest of the DAO!"
attributes.title: Metaclan

attributes.About: "The Humaniq team is building a next generation model for financial services (Banking 4.0) which is based on Blockchain technology, mobile devices and biometric identification systems. Their aim is to empower a market of 2 billion people who currently don’t have access to banking across the world. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "Humaniq DAO consists of different committees which are commonly named guilds in DAO space. ""General Assembly- The main governing body for protecting the organization from malicious decisions.""Delegatory Board- Its functions include voting for candidates to join the General Assembly, committees coordinators and accumulating voting power to participate in proposal processes. You can apply to be added to the council of delegates here or in the discord.""Developmment Committee- The Devs Committee is made up of developers and other folks focused on shipping new apps, improvements, and features at Humaniq.""Marketing Committee- The Marketing Committee is responsible for all public relations, branding and representation of DAO in the crypto space.""Secreteriat- This committee is responsible for all internal processes of the DAO. Reporting, operations, and accountability are all the responsibility of the Secretariat.""Each member of the Humaniq community votes for accessible suggestions on Snapshot, taking part in online discussions or publishing their own ideas. For more information on Committees click here.""To be a part of the community:""- Tell about your proposals in Discord #proposals, discuss and get feedback. ""- When your offer is fully formalized and does not require funding and/or code changes, make a request for a Snapshot. Visit here and start the topic. Minimum threshold for this action is 10,000 HMQ.""- If your proposal requires funding and/or code changes, post it on Humaniq forum in the “Proposals” section and describe your idea following the template. Also place a poll on the Snapshot, which will last at least 5 days.""- Vote with HMQ on Snapshot""- Follow them on socials (Twitter, Telegram)""- Follow Discord #general. Attend weekly Community Call. Check out Meeting Calendar""- Donate for any project""- Join a Committee and attend their weekly calls""- Join a project"
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Alex Fork, Founder and CEO""Humaniq founder and Fintech entrepreneur Alex is one of the most important members of the international Blockchain community, who has worked with the UN to lead the deployment of Blockchain technology to improve the efficiency of UN resources and remittances. He has also spearheaded the harnessing of blockchains in Russia, organising a conference for 500 participants on the Ethereum Blockchain; authoring Bitcoin. More than Just Money; and founding the Fintech accelerator for startups in Russia, Future Fintech. He started Humaniq to help lift the global banked out of poverty."

attributes.About: "21dao is a non-profit supporting emerging artists on Solana. They are a community of artists, collectors, and builders who together are dedicated to unlocking as much creativity as possible and shaping a more beautiful world. attributes.About: "The Graph AdvocatesDAO is the community governing body that oversees membership and contributions of the Graph Advocates Program and community grants in The Graph ecosystem. The mission of the Graph AdvocatesDAO is to drive greater participation in building a decentralized web3 and grow The Graph ecosystem by supporting community-based initiatives and through contributions of Graph Advocates."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Get involved in the community to provide your feedback on community grants in the Forum or engage on discussions in Discord.""2.  Any existing Advocate is eligible to become a member of the Graph AdvocatesDAO. Apply to be an Advocate here. Advocates apply to the Graph AdvocatesDAO via creating a Membership Proposal. ""3. The DAO has three committees that DAO members can partake in: Advocate Committee, Grant Committee and Operations (Ops) Committee. All DAO members are welcome to consider joining one of the committees and earn from the DAO in doing so."

attributes.About: "CENNZnet is a highly optimised, EVM compatible L2 blockchain. It provides a secure and adaptable blockchain network capable of supporting projects that are pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with decentralised tech, NFT technology and P2E gaming. The CENNZnet DAO gives the community the ability to govern and participate in decisions regarding the network at the protocol level."
attributes.HowToJoin: "You can join the DAO in two ways:""1. Become a Citizen- Their vote will help to decide whether a proposal is executed on the network. To become a citizen complete identity verification which involves connecting your wallet to both a Twitter and Discord account. Anyone who completes the verification will become a Citizen, with the role also granted on Discord.""2. Become a Councillor- Councillors are the trusted gatekeepers to the network, with each Councillor having one key that is a part of the multi-signature system that allows changes to the protocol. Staying true to their guiding principles of decentralisation and community decision-making, future Councillor elections will be a process built and led by the community via governance, with support from the CENNZnet team. "

attributes.About: """LexDAO is a Decentralized Legal Guild club, not a law firm and not even an incorporated entity. LexDAO is an unincorporated nonprofit association under Wyo. Lex DAO promotes the use of blockchain technology to create legal contracts. Lex DAO researches, develops, and promotes the wide use of law applications - integrating blockchain smart contracts and legacy, State Law. The mission is to research, develop and evangelize first-class legal methods and blockchain protocols that security rules and promises with code rather than trust."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"LexDAO has a community, and their saying is, “We think that if we give smart, interesting, like-minded people a way to connect, then something good will happen.”

1. Join the forum using:""https://lexdao.discourse.group/""
2. Steps to become a member""Step 1: Fill out the “Join Us” form : https://lexdao.coop/""Step 2: Join Discord : https://discord.com/invite/QA75Zw4VTZ""Step 3: Submit Your Membership Proposal : https://hackmd.io/@LexDAO/HylY7AHyO ""Step 4: Attend a Call ""LexDAO is largely a club built on a level of social trust. The easiest next step is to attend one of the open calls. You can find them on our open events calendar""Step 5: Find a Champion ""You’ll need to find someone to sponsor your DAO proposal, and potentially help you with some of the specifics. If you’re in search of a champion you can also drop a message in the “Champion-Needed” channel"

attributes.About: "HelpDAO creates software for local squads to get funding and allocate help to those who need it the most in the current COVID-19 pandemic. HelpDAO aims to launch local squads that help vulnerable groups in the COVID-19 pandemic. HelpDAO provides the software and the documentation for people to create local help squads."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Help squads are composed of donors, volunteers and supervisors.""Help squads must have a scope, which is comprised of:""- Demographic: E.g. People over 80 year old who live alone""- Location: E.g. Crimea""- Care actions: E.g. Deliver non-perishable food""Donors donate money to a help squad. They receive a membership token which:""- Serves as recognition for their contribution""- Allows them to join the chat group of the help squad""Volunteers then carry out the tasks within the scope of the help squad. They can claim reimbursements by providing proof in the chat.""Supervisors are active members (likely donors) who verify that the volunteers have indeed completed their tasks. Supervisors can also nominate and remove volunteers.""The social identity of all supervisors and volunteers will be public, and donors can determine if they are comfortable with them based on their previous track-record of doing social good and being responsible members of their communities.""They need:""- Users to be able to deposit money into the DAO using their credit card""- Users to be able to get their membership token and store it somewhere""- Users to join the help squad's Telegram chat after they donate""- Volunteers to be able to cash out their Dai into their local currency or bank account""Once multiple squads are set up and working, HelpDAO could start a global fundraiser.""With that global fundraiser, the DAO can then choose which local help squads need funding.""That way, help squads can tap into a pool of global capital."
attributes.title: Help DAO

attributes.About: "Marketing DAO is a grassroots group of marketing, communications, and design professionals in the Ethereum community. It was launched to surface, fund, and execute the right marketing efforts to benefit Ethereum and its thriving ecosystem. Through clear communication, they believe Ethereum can become widely understood for what it is: a powerful blockchain platform that can help businesses, economies, governments, and communities transform for the better."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Anyone can get involved with Marketing DAO in a way that matches their interests and capabilities. There are three paths for involvement:""1. As a Funder — If you are interested in funding Ethereum marketing activities, submit a pledge via this link (minimum of 10 ETH). To get more information about their plans or to discuss your potential participation, email here.""2. As a Member — If you have specific marketing, communications, or design expertise and would like to join the Marketing DAO working group as an active member-contributor, send a short email summarizing your background and motivation for helping.""3. As a Supporter — If you are interested in being a supporter, follow Marketing DAO on Twitter and Medium for updates. Visit their website MarketingDao.org to sign up for the email newsletter and to see more information about upcoming projects."

attributes.About: "PEGZ is a series of 100 unique collectables, drawn digitally by Matt Furie. Every Peg character is a member of a family, one of 10 types, the rarest of which being the Pepers- based on Matt Furie's 2005 cartoon and by now seed-meme, Pepe the Frog. Pegz DAO aims to align holders, investors and supporters of this cultural ecosystem."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"To bid on a NFT:
Connect your wallet account to PEGZ via the "Connect Wallet" button in the header menu. Select "Log in" for Metamask, or "Log in with Wallet Connect" for more options. After you've connected your wallet, you will be asked to create a username and to deposit and wrap ETH to your account. PEGZ uses WETH or "Wrapped Ethereum" for all NFT bidding."

attributes.About: "Commit is a media for crypto adoption and freedom. It is about what defines Web3 and how people interact with it. From decentralized finance to regenerative finance, blockchain gaming, or new ways of working, community members will have the power to decide if they want to see ads, choose advertisers and get shares of the benefits through the DAO. ""CommitDAO is the organization behind Commit media. CommitDAO community collaborates to create user-friendly onramps for people to discover decentralized financial technologies through education, media, and culture. It’s goal is to drive adoption and awareness of truly open journalism for web3 about Decentralized Finance, Regenerative Finance, GameFi, and DAOs."
attributes.HowToJoin: "- To become a member, you need to own a specific amount of $CMT. CMT is the native governance token which coordinates activity and gets distributed to community members for active participation. The only way to get $CMT is to participate in the Commit community. And the CommitDAO will determine what qualifies as participation through token vote.""- $CMT is only available on ComethSwap an AMM on Polygon. You can, buy, sell, provide liquidity and farm $CMT with a WETH-CMT pair.""WETH-CMT Pool: https://swap.cometh.io/#/add/0x7ceb23fd6bc0add59e62ac25578270cff1b9f619/0x9bc0abf87f9350cde55b2cda219871726d620bf9""CMT tracking: https://charts.cometh.io/pair/0xa7032e92853352e780c687342629896cab728db8""You need at least 100 $CMT to obtain the DAO Member role in Discord.""- Join Discord and discuss evolutions of the media, fees, sponsoring and other things.""- If you have community management skills, written content, editing and want to develop an independant Web3 media, reach out to them directly on Discord."

attributes.About: "Hakt DAO is a public good DAO that funds smart contract security through the auctioning of unique, single-edition NFTs themed around the largest crypto hacks in history. Funds raised from NFT auctions will go towards grants, bounties, and white-hat stipends, the distribution of which will be selected by Hakt DAO members."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Members of Hakt DAO will participate in decisions regarding governance rules within the Hakt community and the distribution of DAO treasury funds. To join the DAO, you must hold at least 1 BOB. BOBs are collectible NFTs that act as governance tokens for Hakt DAO. They vary in rarity and artistic features. 1 BOB = 1 vote.""There are several ways to get involved with Hakt DAO:""1. Win a Hakt NFT auction. You will receive the NFT you win and a BOB, which will grant you membership access to the DAO.""2. Apply for a match or grant as a blockchain project, smart contract researcher, or white hacker.""3. Join their Discord."

attributes.About: """Solace is a decentralized insurance protocol run by the Solace DAO. attributes.About: "Dream DAO is a DAO that invests in the future of the Web3 x Social Impact ecosystem by providing diverse GenZers around the globe with the training, funding, mentorship, and opportunities they need to leverage the power of web3 to build a brighter future for humanity. They do this primarily by-""1. fostering an intergenerational learning community for 15-20 year olds seeking to be and build the future of web3 x social impact; and""2. placing their most committed young community members in meaningful paid internships at socially impactful web3 organizations where they can receive mentorship."
attributes.HowToJoin: "There are two broad pathways to membership with voting power in the Dream DAO community:""- The "Builders": talented Gen Zers (15-20 years old when they join the DAO), who have proven themselves as leaders, and are interested in exploring how to leverage the power of web3 to build a brighter future for humanity and the world.""- The "Champions": established leaders representing a range of industries who seed the Dream DAO with SkywalkerZ NFT purchases and direct donations to the DAO treasury, and lend their expertise, networks, and other resources to the mission of Dream DAO""In order to join the Dream DAO, every prospective member must hold a SkywalkerZ NFT, and submit an application that outlines why they'd like to join the community. Mint a SkywalkerZ here.""If you would like to join as a voting member, fill out this interest form to get notified when applications reopen in January 2023: https://daomemberinterest.paperform.co/"

attributes.About: "The Trojan DAO is an art organization that is governed by its participants. Its mission is to bring together a community that includes artists, technologists, and others, to achieve what they can’t do individually, to dissolve the bureaucracy around Grant funding for art/cultural projects on Ethereum. They believe that participants in art projects should be able to coordinate and access funding without the need for centralized institutions, central banks, and top-down bureaucracies."
attributes.HowToJoin: "To become a member of TrojanDAO and participate in voting- 1 ETH : 1 voting share""1. Contribute ETH""- Individuals: Pledge a minimum of 1 ETH redeemable for 1 share minimum""- Orgs/DAOs: Pledge a minimum of 5 ETH redeemable for 5 shares minimum (to delegate’s ETH address)""1. Contribute to a DAO Circle- Join a DAO circle. Contribute work. Upon completion, apply for a share in the DAO. All proposals must be submitted on behalf of applicants by existing members.""2. Pledge ETH- Head over to the Trojan DAO interface, sign in with your web 3 wallet (Metamask or Wallet Connect). In the wETH center, wrap the amount of ETH that you would like to pledge into wETH, wait for the first network confirmation, then “Approve Trojan”."

attributes.About: "Values is building a community-owned decentralized financial infrastructure to bring more stability and transparency for the metaverse space. attributes.About: "Boys Club is a social club and community designed to welcome women and non-binary individuals in web3. Their community attracts a diverse array of women across the spectrum of web3 experience, from those who have yet to set up their first wallet to crypto-native founders & operators who have been building in the space for years. ""Recognizing that crypto and blockchain are reimagining how society functions at a base level, they envision a world where women and non-binary individuals are at the forefront of building new avenues for wealth distribution and creation, in turn mitigating the replication of existing inequalities in web2."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Apply here to join the Boys Club Discord. They review application twice monthly and if approved you'll get an invite to Discord.""Subscribe to their newsletter here.""The entry in the DAO is restricted as they follow a MVC- Minimum Viable Community approach. Following this approach, their current contributors (founding team, guild leaders, and guild members) will be the first group of members to participate in Boys Club DAO V1. Their current contributors will be responsible for testing, iterating, and providing feedback on the first iteration of our DAO before they open membership up to a larger group (Boys Club DAO V2)."

attributes.About: "Obscura is an organization committed to empowering photographers in the web3 ecosystem. Many photographic stories go untold due to lack of funding. While commissioning world renowned photographers in projects with full creative autonomy, they redistribute a sizable portion of funds through grants, exhibitions, and more opportunities."

attributes.About: "Joystream is a substrate-based protocol that aims to formalize a shared content platform. It is operated and governed by its users. Joystream provides the architecture to build video-based applications on the Polkadot blockchain. It also has its own video platform where you can upload videos, sell them as NFTs, and also issue a token from your own channel. It calls for an arrangement where media platforms are accountable to the people they impact, which are primarily their users, be it as consumers, creatives, third-party developers, or workers."

attributes.About: """Proof of Humanity (PoH) is a social identity verification system on Ethereum. Proof of Humanity, a system combining webs of trust, is a system combining social verification with video submission in order to create a Sybil-proof list of humans. It is meant to be used by individuals as a point-of-entry to a myriad of new use cases that require Sybil resistance to be able to be deployed at scale and also to be plugged into a variety of existing and new applications in need of such identity systems. Proof Of Humanity is launching with Democracy Earth's UBI Token. All the verified humans will be the first fully decentralized UBI recipients. It was created by Kleros and Democracy Earth."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join PoH using the following steps:""- Register your profile- Go to the Proof of Humanity app, Connect your Ethereum / Web3 wallet, Then submit the profile.""- Subscribe to Profile Update Notifications""- Monitor your profile validation progress- Watch your profile go through the validation process and finalize registration.""- Registered - If the profile is accepted and registered on PoH. You will receive your initial deposit back and collect UBI tokens at this stage.""- Vouch for another profile- Vouching for someone is a benevolent act to help them get into the registry.""- Challenge Suspicious Users-Users can challenge pending submissions that they think don’t comply with the requirements for acceptance. When a submission is challenged, the decision goes to dispute resolution in an ERC792-compliant dispute resolution system like Kleros."
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Santiago Siri""He is the Founder of Democracy Earth Foundation, a non-profit organization backed by Y Combinator that built Universal Basic Income (UBI) on Ethereum and launched the Proof of Humanity DAO, where he serves as a Mission Board Member. attributes.About: """It is an exchange, farming, and pooling platform for tokens built on Binance Smart Chain. CAKE is a governance token issued by a decentralized exchange PancakeSwap, which is an automatic market maker also called AMM. attributes.About:
"""Ankr is a blockchain-based cross-chain infrastructure with a DeFi platform that enables staking and dApp development. Ankr is a distributed computing platform that aims to leverage idle computing resources in data centers and edge devices. Companies can use untapped cloud computing power from on-site data centers and devices around the world to reduce the risk of using centralized providers. Ankr's cryptocurrency, ANKR, serves as a medium of exchange on the Ankr network
 and users can pay for services such as the monthly fee to run a node. Ankr also provides benefits for owners of unused computing power who can monetize their surplus whether it's in the form of a device, an on-prem data center, a private cloud, or even a public cloud."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. The token holders can submit and vote on proposals, thus participate in the governance of the DAO. To buy $ANKR token : https://www.kraken.com/learn/buy-ankr""2. Ankr’s RPC Service: Connects the developers, apps, and the world to Web3.""It consists of""1—> Basics with Public Plan:""What's available for the Public plan user:""- RPC Endpoints and Advanced APIs at the corresponding rate limits.""- Connection code snippets.""- RPC methods testing tool.""- Public usage data (stats on requests from all Public service users).""2—>Basics with Premium Plan:""What's available for the Premium plan user:""- Premium Endpoints and Advanced APIs at the corresponding rate limits.""- Connection code snippets.""- RPC methods testing tool.""- Personal usage data.""- Access to Hybrid infrastructure.""- Requests charging and payments history data.""- Connect wallet""- Deposit funds""For more info: https://www.ankr.com/docs/rpc-service/service-plans/"

attributes.About: """Numerai is a blockchain-based hedge fund using crowdsourced predictions by a network of data scientists. It is a Cryptographic Token for Coordinating Machine Intelligence and Preventing Overfitting. The Numerai Tournament is where you build machine-learning models on abstract financial data to predict the stock market. Your models can be staked with the NMR cryptocurrency to earn rewards based on performance. The platform relies on a monthly machine learning and data science “tournament” where users, primarily data scientists, can submit trading algorithms about the stock market. Numerai then employs artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze the predictions, and the best are included in Numerai’s “meta-model” which combines all the underlying inputs on which it will trade the stock market."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join the forum using: https://forum.numer.ai/""2.Steps to be a part of Numer.ai""1. Sign up at https://numer.ai/""2. Download the dataset with training data and example scripts""3. Build your model and submit your predictions back to Numerai""4. Stake NMR on your models to earn/burn based on performance""5. Automate your weekly submissions and grow your stake over time""For new users: https://docs.numer.ai/tournament/new-users"
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Richard Craib, CEO and Founder""He graduated from the University of Cape Town in 2008 and later acquired one more bachelor’s degree from Cornell University, and spent a year in UC Berkeley. His professional career started with founding Numerai and has taken him to a Forbes 30 under 30 designee position. Richard Craib is often cited for his innovative approach to hedge fund management and the revolutionary idea to rely so heavily on artificial intelligence for stock price prediction. Not only that, Numerai has created one of the largest global data science tournaments.""Linkedin- https://www.linkedin.com/in/richardcraib"

attributes.About: """The request is an open network for payment requests. It allows anyone to create, store, and access invoices in a universal, decentralized network. The payments on Request are performed by simply sending an invoice through the blockchain; the counterparty can then detect the request and pay it with one click in a peer-to-peer manner. The fact that the payments are push-generated instead of pull-generated is one of the Request’s key advantages. There is no need for users to share their account information. The use of blockchain technology also eliminates the need for third-party processors, resulting in a reduction in transaction costs. The Request Network leverages decentralized blockchains such as Ethereum and IPFS for an increased level of security, privacy, and data ownership for the end user."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join the Request Hub for builders using discord. If looking to build with requests and resources or other builders to collaborate with, then join the Request Hub on Slack or find resources on Github.""2. Buy the token here and participate in the governance"

attributes.About: "ScribeDAO is a learn-to-earn DAO that creates incentive structures for motivated Web3 community members to upskill themselves from readers of content, to synthesizers of content and ultimately to creators of content. They aim to lower the barrier to entry to crypto by making information digestible. This benefits veterans and newcomers alike, from short summaries of the best pieces of content that comes out daily."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Scribes: Everyone who wants to contribute starts off as a scribe. Scribes help to summarize the latest and greatest pieces of content in crypto. After giving a quick intro about yourself and what topics you’re interested in, the knowledge seekers from the community will assign a relevant article/podcast for you to summarize. To start scribing, head to #volunteer-here on Discord and let them know what you'd like to write about.""Knowledge Seeker: After writing 3 summaries, you become a Knowledge Seeker. You will be now able to pick your own articles from the backlog, add articles into the backlog or summarize articles that you find yourself. It’s important to also maintain a balance of one request per one submitted summary.""Community Scribe: If you want to contribute to the development and growth of ScribeDAO in areas beyond just content, or have bright ideas on how to improve the DAO and are able to help execute- check out the available projects that you can work on “insert link”. Reach out to one of the Community Scribes to find out more. If you see a potential area of improvement that isn’t in the list, discuss it in the #community management channel on Discord.""Dev Scribe: If writing code is more your thing instead of summaries and you like the vision and mission of ScribeDAO, drop them a message in the automation or website channel!""Other ways: Want to contribute but writing isn’t your thing? There’s plenty of other ways you can contribute - some examples but not limited to: Translation, proofreading. You can also drop any suggestions or ideas for improvement in suggestions- feedback."

attributes.About: "RiseDAO is a not-for-profit DAO focused on giving women and non-binary residing in developing economies better opportunities to establish themselves in the tech/NFT space, where opportunities might be scarce, and costs of acquiring cryptocurrencies such as ethereum prohibitive. RiseDAO wants to help women artists by providing grants that cover gas and minting fees to sell art on NFT marketplaces."
attributes.HowToJoin:
"- To Support, become a sponsor by contributing ETH to fund training and onboarding. Minimum contributions are set at 1 ETH. Contact the on Twitter or Discord for more details.""- Artists applications will require the submission of a portfolio, and those selected will move onwards to an online interview, where the creative process and portfolio details will be discussed. ""- Candidates wishing to apply for the coding/programming training will be asked to submit a cover letter about their career and motivation to engage in the training. No previous background in coding/programming is mandatory. Selected candidates will be asked for an online interview. Online selection meetings will be available in three languages (English, Spanish and Portuguese) to facilitate communication and promote inclusion. However, all grantees are required to have basic English knowledge to participate in Discord chats and mentoring, as well as navigate NFT marketplaces.

attributes.About: "Blu3 DAO’s mission is to empower women to achieve financial freedom through learning, exploring and building their careers in the Web3 space. It aims to onboard more women, nonbinary and allies. Through sponsorship, mentorship, and the support of a stellar community of women, Blu3 DAO aspires to create more women leaders in the web3 space through job opportunities, building dApps, launching DAOs and tokenized communities."
attributes.HowToJoin: "Read the Blu3 DAO Contributors Guide here and fill in the Onboarding Form. There are several memebership tiers:""- Community Member: If you have limited time this is the tier for you. A Blu3 community member is in alignment with the mission and vision of Blu3 DAO. A community member strives to keep up to date with Blu3 DAO initiatives, events, and partnerships. Actively contribute to conversations on social channels and make an effort to attend IRL/Virtual events.""- Contributor: If you are passionate about building something from the ground up and working in an environment that fosters creativity, autonomy and team work, this is the tier for you. A Blu3 contributor is a person who is looking to play an active role in building the DAO by taking ownership of a role within the Blu3 Family. There are many contributor roles available. If you do not see what you’re interested in or feel they need additional roles to support the community, reach out to them with your suggestions.""- Ambassador: A Blu3 ambassador is a respected leader in the community they are apart of, or a traveling nomad in the Web 3 space. An ambassador is interested in building the DAO by partnering up with Blu3 in creating brand awareness, partnerships and community expansion. Typically, an ambassador meets one of the following:""1. A leader or point of influence in his/her community with a community or following of 20K+.""2. A social media influencer in with a following of 20K or more.""3. A frequent conference attendee and/ or nomad who meets other conference goers frequently.""A Blu3 ambassador champions the Blu3 community and extends the invite to join Blu3 DAO when meeting like-minded individuals. ""- Advisor: A Blu3 Advisor typically holds expertise or acts as subject matter experts for the Blu3 family (legal, crypto accounting, tokenomics, consulting, media, etc.). The goal is to provide in depth knowledge, network and support for Blu3 to grow and thrive."

attributes.About: "PizzaDAO is formed to promote pizza in all forms. They're a pizza-focused community that operates with transparency and communal governance over its treasury. PizzaDAO celebrates this historic occasion for Blockchain and Pizza by throwing a Global #FreePizzaDay Party!""Rare Pizzas are a collection of 10,000 generative, baked pizza NFTs created in a collaboration between 300+ artists from around the globe. The proceeds from the sale of these pizza NFTs are used to buy pizza for people all over the world on Bitcoin Pizza Day, 5/22."

You can buy Rare Pizzas on Opensea. or""2. Open a browser that supports Metamask Extension like Chrome. Go to RarePizzas.com/mint. Connect your wallet. Press “BUY” to make a purchase."

attributes.About:
"Ribon is a decentralized donation platform that allows donors to become promoters and, by doing so, encourages others to join them in a global culture of giving. This way it’s possible to increase
donations to charities, promote a culture of giving in the world and make people happier. At Ribon, people can donate to charity even without spending a cent by engaging with sponsorships that circulate in the app. Ribons -their virtual coins - can be donated to 4 of the most efficient NGOs in the world, which work to eradicate extreme poverty through causes: food fortification, basic health, potable water and medicines."
attributes.HowToJoin: "- Donating through the Ribon App- In the Ribon App users are connected with NGOs, where ribons are transformed into food, healthcare, quality of life and much more. With the app you can make donations without taking any dollars out of your pocket. With the app you can perform various activities that guarantee ribons to be donated by you, such as: reading good news, carrying out wellness activities, inviting friends to be part of the community and many other ways. With the ribons in hand, you can choose one or more institutions that you want to donate. Your donation turns into cash for the chosen projects.""- Boosting your donations by being a subscriber- In addition to free donations, you can subscribe to a monthly subscription or a one-time donation. With both you can increase your donation impact. Paying 2 dollars monthly, for example, you will guarantee 500 donations. In this way, you are not only driving greater donations, but also helping to keep Ribon active and accessible.""- Being a member of the Ribonita community- Join discord.""- Dework- Contribute through Dework and get paid in USDC."

attributes.About: """dYdX is a leading decentralized exchange offering Perpetual, Margin, & Spot trading, as well as borrow/lend pools on Ethereum. It is a margin trading platform where you can borrow cryptocurrency. It allows you to make predictions about the future price of cryptocurrencies. Typically, these features are only available in centralized exchanges like FTX. DYdX is unique in that it allows for the decentralization of access to margin trading. The protocol is accessible to anyone looking to add or build to it."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join the forum using: https://forums.dydx.community/""2. how to buy DYDX?""- Open an online account.""- Buy a wallet (optional).""- Make your purchase.""Guide to buy token: https://www.benzinga.com/money/how-to-buy-dydx"
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Antonio Juliano, founder at dYdX""After obtaining a computer science degree at Princeton University in 2015, Antonio started working at Coinbase as a software engineer, where he learned about cryptocurrency and the world of blockchain. He was fascinated by the new technology, especially after listening to some of the most prominent people in the space give talks at Coinbase, such as Vitalik Buterin and Polychain Capital founder Olaf Carlson-Wee. Hearing them talk about smart contract implementation and gas usage on Ethereum got him excited about what could be built on blockchain technology.""However, he learned a few lessons from the experience, including the importance of timing when launching a product exceeding even that of its use case. Soon, he realized the value in building something on Ethereum that could bring some innovation to the decentralized finance sector.""Linkedin-https://www.linkedin.com/in/antoniojuliano"
attributes.title: dYdX

foundersDetails.name: Antonio Juliano
foundersDetails.description:
After obtaining a computer science degree at Princeton University in 2015, Antonio started working at Coinbase as a software engineer, where he learned about cryptocurrency and the world of blockchain. He was fascinated by the new technology, especially after listening to some of the most prominent people in the space give talks at Coinbase, such as Vitalik Buterin and Polychain Capital founder Olaf Carlson-Wee. Hearing them talk about smart contract implementation and gas usage on Ethereum got him excited about what could be built on blockchain technology.
However, he learned a few lessons from the experience, including the importance of timing when launching a product exceeding even that of its use case. Soon, he realized the value in building something on Ethereum that could bring some innovation to the decentralized finance sector.

attributes.About: """Dexe network is an ecosystem of various tools and platforms coming together as the go-to one-stop-shop for DeFi trading. Most importantly, the DeXe Network connects successful traders and followers in a transparent, verifiable way for the benefit of both groups. DAO DeXe manages the DeXe Network through the voting power of DEXE holders."

attributes.About: """Raydium is an automated market maker (AMM) built on the Solana blockchain which leverages the central order book of the Serum decentralized exchange (DEX) to enable lightning-fast trades, shared liquidity, and new features for earning yield. Raydium's swap feature allows users to exchange between tokens through Serum, while its UI also allows for other trading features like limit orders. The exchange also features a token called RAY that will allow holders to claim 0.03% of trading fees. Raydium aims to capture and maintain a leadership position among AMMs and liquidity providers on Serum while leveraging the power of Solana to drive the evolution of decentralized finance (DeFi) and emerge as a leading protocol in the space."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Buy $RAY tokens here and participate in governance""2. Join the AcceleRaytor:""AcceleRaytor is an initiative by Raydium to spearhead the growth of the Solana Ecosystem. It serves as a launchpad for the latest projects to raise capital and drive initial liquidity in a decentralized and interoperable manner while enabling both project and Raydium communities to participate in carefully curated and vetted token offerings. If you're interested in launching a project on AcceleRaytor, please fill out this form.""How to participate: AcceleRaytor launches consist of 'pools' where users can contribute funds in order to receive an allocation of project tokens.""1. Visit the 'AcceleRaytor' page on Raydium. Here you can view pools and their status.""2. You can click on a pool to view additional details. Make sure to make note of the requirements to join the pool to ensure you'll be able to participate.""3. When the pool opens, to participate first make sure that you meet the requirements, check official announcements from the projects for full details.""4. In order to claim your tokens for any winning lottery tickets, return to the pool at the specified claim time. Then simply click 'Claim' and funds will be transferred to your wallet!"
attributes.FoundingTeam: "Raydium is created by a team of anonymous founders, which go by the pseudonyms.""AlphaRay""AlphaRay leads overall strategy, operations, product direction, and business development for Raydium. With a background in algorithmic trading in commodities, Alpha transitioned to market making and liquidity-providing for cryptocurrency in 2017 and hasn't looked back. After diving into DeFi in the summer of 2020, Alpha saw a market need for an order book AMM to aggregate liquidity, and with the release of Serum, pulled together a team of experienced trading developers to tackle the problem head-on.""XRay, Raydium's Chief of Technology and Dev Team leader""X has 8 years of experience as a trading and low-latency systems architect for both traditional and crypto markets. X designs all of Raydium’s systems and infrastructure as needed. ""GammaRay ""GammaRay heads up marketing and communications while also playing a key role in strategy and product direction. Gamma spent a large part of his career at a leading data analytics and market research firm, working on both client engagements and corporate marketing. Prior to Raydium, Gamma's focus within cryptocurrency has been technical analysis and discretionary trading."

attributes.About: """TrustSwap is a distributed platform, cryptocurrency, and protocol that promises a new evolution to decentralized finance (DeFi). It aims to achieve this through next-generation multi-chain token swaps and other functionalities that aim to solve existing problems with split payments, subscriptions and cross-chain token swaps. TrustSwap offers smart contract services and innovative solutions for decentralized finance (DeFi) and helps the crypto community transact with integrity and accountability. TrustSwap solves problems in the DeFi space connected to payments, escrow, minting, token and liquidity locks, and fundraising."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join TrustSwap Launchpad:""TrustSwap Launchpad is a full-service launch platform where stakers (non-US*) can gain early access and participate in the most promising blockchain projects.""- Step 1: Make sure you own a wallet that is interacting with the Ethereum Blockchain (e.g. Metamask). In addition, your wallet should hold ETH and SWAP tokens.""- Step 2: Navigate to Launchpad Dashboard and connect your wallet. We recommend Metamask.""- Step 3: Select Stake.""- Step 4: Complete the steps outlined in the Staking Portal. The staking requirements are now complete.""- Step 5: Fill in the application form within the 24-hour launch window and wait for a confirmation email which you should receive within 72 hours that includes payment details.""1. Navigate to the TrustSwap website and click [Buy SWAP] on the upper right of the page."

attributes.About: """A decentralized protocol called The Graph is used to index and search data from blockchains, starting with Ethereum. It enables the querying of data that is challenging to query directly. Based on subgraph manifests, also referred to as subgraph descriptions, the Graph learns what and how to index Ethereum data. Anyone can create and publish subgraphs, which are open APIs that can be queried by applications using GraphQL to retrieve blockchain data. With more networks on the way, the graph currently supports indexing data from IPFS, POA, and Ethereum."
attributes.HowToJoin: "1. Join the forum using: https://forum.thegraph.com/""2. Join the DAO  Committees:""- Graph AdvocatesDAO:""https://forms.clickup.com/37437860/f/13pgd4-4007/RXO7DCQPT5XCA8X7R7""The Graph AdvocatesDAO is the community governing body that oversees membership and contributions of the Graph Advocates Program  and community grants in The Graph ecosystem.""- Grant Committee:""The Grant Committee is primarily tasked with assessing new applications for community grants. This committee supports DAO members and Advocates in formulating and submitting high-quality proposals and conducting due diligence on behalf of the DAO. Individuals who are passionate about bootstrapping new projects and helping initiatives come to fruition would enjoy being part of the Grant Committee.""- Operations (Ops) Committee:""The Ops Committee is responsible for ensuring DAO operations are running efficiently across platforms and committees. People with spreadsheet competence, project management expertise, community moderation skills or passion for process development will find a wealth of opportunity to engage in this committee. This is a place for everyone looking to shape how the DAO successfully operates, and possibly establish best practices that can be adopted across the broader web3 ecosystem."
attributes.FoundingTeam:
"Brandon Ramirez, Co-founder and Research Lead, Edge & Node @ The Graph""As Research Lead, he designed the system-level architecture and economics of the protocol. He also defined the product and developer experiences that are being used by The Graph’s first users to learn about and use the network productively. His prior experience as a product owner and software engineer on data intensive applications (Excel, Mulesoft), his longtime interest in economics and behavioral science, as well as his academic experience in robotics and control systems have all influenced his approach to designing The Graph.""https://twitter.com/rezbrandon
Jannis Pohlmann, Co-Founder and CTO at Edge & Node""He is an experienced software engineer with a passion for blockchains, functional languages, uni-directional dataflows, user experience, well-written code, and transparent processes. He is currently leading the engineering team at Edge & Node, where we are working on The Graph, a decentralized query protocol for blockchains and decentralized file systems""LinkedIn""Yaniv Tal, Co-founder and Project Lead, Edge & Node @ The Graph""Yaniv has been working in crypto for more than three years. Prior to starting The Graph, Yaniv and Brandon worked together at Mulesoft (an API developer company sold to Salesforce) and co-founded a developer tooling startup using immutable databases. As co-founder and Project Lead, Yaniv has successfully led The Graph team and community of Indexers and Curators to get us where we are today.""https://www.linkedin.com/in/yanivtal9/"

child Nouns NFTs, aiming to expose more people to the project. Similarly to its elder, the Lil

attributes.About:
"
Dope Wars is an NFT gaming, trading, art and development project inspired by the 1984-released game Drug Wars game where players were graphics-less hustling around New York selling drugs. It is a fully decentralized, community driven, gaming metaverse project inspired by hip-hop culture. They are bootstrapping a modern-day GTA-inspired metaverse and series of games built by decentralized game studio on the Ethereum blockchain. Dope Wars is also an experiment in decentralized project finance and governance using a DAO."

attributes.About: "Orochi is a distributed group of teams in the Ethereum crypto space that joined forces using on-chain collaboration and governance tools. Their initial purpose was a singular experiment, help fund and sponsor an event during devcon 4 in Osaka. That event, Year of the DAOs, was a huge success and now Orochi looks into other events and local meetups to continue experimenting with DAO style organization. OrochiDAO v1 was one of the first Moloch DAOs sponsored by another DAO (Metacartel). V2 is now summoned by the creator of FestDAO (https://alchemy.daostack.io/dao/0x8990e11b69403ea53ef2b32434bbd7dbf84b5234)which is powered by DAOStack. This means OrochiDAO v2 is one of the first cross DAO collaborations."
attributes.HowToJoin: "To join, each member had to pledge 500 DAI.""- Existing members had to make proposals to add these new members.""- It would have 3 days voting period followed by 3 days grace period which allowed disagreeing members to ragequit.""- Joining period was between 22nd to 31st Jan 2020."

attributes.About: "PeopleDAO is an incubator for subDAOs and community projects. They provide seed funding, product development, strategic direction, marketing boosts, and consulting around governance. PeopleDAO was born from a web3 movement to buy a private copy of the US Constitution. When the project failed in its mission the developers burned control of the $PEOPLE token contract, sunsetting their involvement (https://twitter.com/ConstitutionDAO/status/1470970371025293317?ref=people-dao.com). A group of community members formed PeopleDAO and adopted $PEOPLE as its governance token, impressed by the meme coin's decentralization, capped supply, and inspiring history. "
attributes.HowToJoin: "Anyone can join PeopleDAO's Discord and start contributing.""- Conduct the onboarding process described in the #onboarding channel.""- From there check out the #bounty-board channel or Dework(https://app.dework.xyz/peopledao?ref=people-dao.com) page for tasks that need completing. They pay contributors for their work.""$PEOPLE token unlocks two key advantages. It grants you the option to vote in Snapshot proposals and enables you to attain Verified Member status in Discord, which confers benefits such as access to activities, POAPs, or whitelist spots. Buy here(https://www.okx.com/markets/prices/constitutiondao-people?ref=people-dao.com)."
attributes.title: People DAO

attributes.About:
"Huobi Token is an ecosystem token launched by Huobi Global, offering benefits such as trading fee and margin discounts and access to certain trading events. HT is the native token of the cryptocurrency exchange Huobi Global. It is a decentralized digital asset based on the Ethereum(https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ethereum/)
 blockchain. One key function of the token is to reduce commissions for trading operations on the exchange, which are usually paid from users' wallets. Huobi Token is a relatively young project. It first launched in January 2018, hot on the heels of the release of a native token on rival crypto exchange Binance(https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/binance/). "

attributes.About: "NEAR Protocol is a layer-one blockchain that was designed as a community-run cloud computing platform and that eliminates some of the limitations that have been bogging competing blockchains, such as low transaction speeds, low throughput, and poor interoperability. This provides the ideal environment for DApps and creates a developer and user-friendly platform. Its declared goal is to build a platform that is “secure enough to manage high-value assets like money or identity and performant enough to make them useful for everyday people.” NEAR was a machine learning project before it became a blockchain development platform."

If you have the necessary technical skills and the required $NEAR to meet the minimum seat price, you can set up a node and become a validator within 48-72 hours.""1. To Set up your account"

attributes.About: "C.R.E.A.M. Finance is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals, institutions, and protocols to access financial services. Part of the yearn finance ecosystem, it is a permissionless, open source, and blockchain agnostic protocol serving users on Ethereum, Cream is a lending platform that enables users to permissionless borrow or lend from a pool of assets. Rather than interest rates being set by individuals, they are determined algorithmically based on the proportion of assets lent out. The cream is a fork of Compound."
